src: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers. This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano. On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.

src: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers. This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano. On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.

src: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan. Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public. For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides. This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan. Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
mt: Daya daga cewa masu yiwuwar samar da wasan kwaikwayo zuwa DVD format shine matsalolin da yawa idan aka yi iƙirarin. Akalla kusan kashi ɗaya na masu yin wasan kwaikwayo suna da matsalolin da yawa idan aka yi iƙirarin. ref: Daya daga cikin matsalolin da aka fi sani yayin kokarin juya fim zuwa tsarin DVD shine overscan. Yawancin telebijin ana yin su ne ta hanyar da za ta faranta wa jama'a rai. Bisa wannan dalilin, dukkan wani abu da ka gani a Telebijin an yanyanke shi daga ta sama da kasa da kuma gefensa. Ana yin wannan don tabbatar da cewa hoton ya rufe dukkan allo. Wannan shi ake kira overscan. Abun takaici, idan kayi DVD, ana iya yanka iyakokin ta, kuma idan bidiyon suna da jerin kalmomin suna kusa da kasa, ba za a nuna su gabaɗaya ba.

src: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions. General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements. General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping. The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.
mt: Shirin Amurka ya yi amfani da shirin yakin da aka tsara daga cikin manyan hanyoyi biyu. John Cadwalder ya yi amfani da shirin yakin da aka tsara don yin amfani da hanyoyi biyu. James Ewing ya yi amfani da sojojin 700 na jama'a don yin amfani da hanyoyi biyu. Sojojin 2,400 na yau da kullum sun yi amfani da hanyoyi biyu.
ref: Amurka ta dogara da shirin ta na kai hari a jere daga sassa uku daban-daban. Janar John Cadwalder zai kaddamar da harin wuce gona da iri kan rundunar sojojin Burtaniya a Bordentown, don toshe duk wani karfafawa. Janar James Ewing zai dauki mayaƙai 700 a hayin Kogin Trenton Ferry, kwace gada ta Assunpink Creek kuma ta hana duk wasu sojojin abokan gaba tserewa. Babbar rundunar farmakin mai dakaru 2,400 za ta ƙetara kogin a daidai mil 9 a arewacin Trenton, sannan su kasu gida biyu, ɗaya ƙarƙashin Greene da kuma ɗayan ƙarƙashin Sullivan, domin kai farmaki kafin asuba.

src: "After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap. Through the night between 150 and 200 copies were made, now known as ""Dunlap broadsides"". The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8. One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10. The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived."
mt: "Bayan yin aiki a ranar 4 ga watan Yuli, wata coci da aka rubuta ta hannu wacce ta kasance ta sune ta shugaban kasa John Hancock da sakataren Charles Thomson ta zama ta farko da aka kafa a cikin gida ta jirgin saman jiragen kasuwanci na John Dunlap. A kusa da kwanaki 150 zuwa 200 na coci na Dunlap na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duniya na duni
ref: Bayan Majalisar wakilai ta amince da shi a ranar 4 ta Yuli, sa'an nan aka aika wani daftarin da aka rubuta da hannu wanda Shugaban Majalisar John Hancock ya sa hannu da ɗan nesa zuwa ga shagon buga rubutu na John Dunlap. Cikin daren an buga tsakanin 150 da 200 wanda aka fi sani da “Dunlap Broadsides”. John Nixon ne ya yi karatun farko na daftarin a bainar jama’a cikin filin Independence Hall a ranar 8 ga watan Yuli. An aika ma George Washington ɗaya a ranar 6 ga Yuli, wanda ya karanta ma sojojinsa a New York ranar 9 ga Yuli. Wani kwafi ya isa Landan a ranar 10 ga watan Agusta. Manyan bangarori 25 na Dunlap da har yanzu aka san sun wanzu sune mafi thufan kwafin rubutattun takardun. Kwafin rubutun hannun na asali ya salwanta.

src: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements. Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals). Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position. When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach. Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
mt: Colonists, wanda ya gane wannan aiki, sun kuma soke karfafa. Sojojin da suka karfafa wuri mai tsaron sojojin ciki gaba sun hada da 1st da 3rd New Hampshire regiments na 200, da kuma Colonels John Stark da James Reed (dukansu sun zama jami'ai bayan haka). Stark's men suna da wuri a kan kofa a karkashin kofa ta kudu na wuri mai tsaron sojojin Colonist. Lokacin da tsaunin tsauni ya gano wani gaban a kan kogin Mystic a karkashin gabar kudu na kogin, suka yi yawa a kan kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da kuma karkashin kofa da k
ref: ‘Yan kama-wuri-zaunan, ganin wanna lamarin, sun nemi karin taimako.. Runduna dake sahun matsayar gaba sun hada da dakaru na 1 da na 3 daga rundunar New Hampshire rajimantin maza 200, karkashin shugabancin Kanar John Stark da James Reed (dukkansu daga baya sun zama Janar). Mutanen Stark suka ja daga a jikin shingen ta karshen arewacin inda Colonist suka tsaya. Lokacin da karamin tashin ruwa ta bude rata daidai da Kogin Sufi wato Mystic River kusa da arewa maso gabas na mashigin teku, sun hanzarta shimfiɗa shinge tare da ɗan gajeren bangon dutse zuwa arewa wanda ke ƙare da gefen ruwa a karamin bakin teku. Gridley ko Stark sun sanya gungumen da ke kusa da ƙafa 100 (mita 30) a gaban katangar kuma suka ba da umarnin cewa babu wanda zai yi wuta har sai masu doka sun wuce shi.

src: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty. Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty. During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne. The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
mt: Asiya ta zamani ta daidaita tsawon lokuta ta tarihi; kowane lokaci na Sin ta zamani ko kowane iyalin da ke mulki ya kasance dinastiyar. Kuma tsakanin kowane dinastiyar, ya kasance lokacin da ake rufe yankuna. ref: Ƙasar China ta zamanin da tana da wata hanyar musamman ta nuna lokutan yanayi daban-daban; kowane mataki na China ko kowane iyali da ya hau karagar mulki to shi ma daula ce ta daban. Haka nan tsakanin kowace daula a kan sami lokaci na rashin zaman lafiya tsakanin larduna. Fitacce daga waɗannan zamuna shi ne zamanin Masarautu Uku da ya faru tsawon shekaru 60 tsakanin Daular Han da ta Jin. A wancan lokaci yaki ya barke tsakanin mafi yawan gidajen sarauta da ke hankoron kujerar sarki. Masarauta Uku ya kasance daya daga cikin zamunan da aka fi zub da jini a tarihin Tsohuwar China dubban mutane sun mutu suna gwagwarmaya don zama a kan madaukakiyar kujera a babbar fada a Xi’an.

src: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well. In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day. The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday. Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.
mt: Rundunar sojojin jirgin karkara sun yi daidaitattun fasali da kuma karkara. A cikin fasali na nomadic, jirgin karkara ke yin yawa a ranar ƙasa da yin gudun duniya a ranar ƙasa. src: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks. Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals. Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.

src: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area. When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic. When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.

src: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife. Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem. An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
mt: Ƙirƙirar al'adun al'umma yana karɓar mutane masu sha'awar ziyartar yankuna masu tsabon al'umma don abin da ya sa a dadi, ciki har da tsabon al'adun kwayoyin halitta da kwayoyin halitta. src: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left. In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars. Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.

A cikin wannan na’urar sufuri mai sauyawa kowa na da alaka da juna tare da tallafawa, tsarin sufuri ne wanda ya dogara da motocin daidaikun mutane. Ilimin kimiyya yanzu ya nuna cewa wannan babban tattalin arzikin carbon ya lalata biosphere daga ɗayan ƙasashe masu tabbatacce waɗanda suke tallafawa cigaban ɗan adam shekaru miliyan biyu da suka gabata.

src: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter. Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1. The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons. Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.

Tsakiya kwayar halittar ta kunshi abubuwa guda biyu-yayan kwayoyin zarra mara cajin lantarki da mai caji karbar wuta. Protons na dauke da cajin wutan lantarki mafi soyuwa yayin da ita Neutron bata dauke da wutan lantarki. Electrons suna da cajin wutan lantarki mummuna.

src: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers. A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.

src: "Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that. Since students are often the most critical audience, the blog writer begins to strive to improve writing to avoid criticism. Also blogging ""forces students to become more savvy about the world around them."" The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004). Blogging is a tool that inspires collaboration, and encourages students to extend learning well beyond the traditional school day. Appropriate use of blogs ""can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002)."
mt: "Blogs na iya taimakawa wajen zartar da rubutun marubuta. Wannan yayin da marubuta na iya fara aikinsu da rubutun daidaitattun tatsuniya da rubutun, yadda zartar da martani na jama'a yanzu ya canza haka. Saboda cewa marubuta na iya yin martani mafi girma, marubuta ya fara yin rubutun daidaitattun tatsuniya da rubutun don hana martani. Kuma, amfani da kayan aiki na blog na iya taimakawa wajen zartar da aiki, da kuma yin amfani da marubuta don samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da kuma samun yanci da yin aiki da k
ref: Shafukan yanar gizo na gulmace-gulmace na iya taimakawa inganta rubuce-rubucen ɗalibai. Yayinda ɗalibai kan fara kwarewar su ta yanar gizo tare da lafuzza mara kyau da rubutu, kasancewar masu sauraro gabaɗaya suna canza hakan. Tun da dalibai sune galibin wadanda suka ziyartar shafi, mawallafin shafin intanet lallai ne ya yi kokarin inganta salon rubutunsa saboda gujewa suka. Har yanzu a wallafar ta shafin intanet “ya saka dalibin kara farga da lamuran duniyar da suke rayuwa ciki.” Bukatar biyan bukatun masu sauraronsu yana saka daliban kaimin zama masu wayo da kuma sha’awarsu (Toto, 2004). Rubutun ra'ayin kanka a yanar gizo kayan aiki ne wanda ke karfafa hadin gwiwa, da ƙarfafa dalibai don faɗaɗa koyin karatu sosai fiye da ranar makaranta ta al'ada. Amfani da ingantacciyar hanyar amfani da yanar gizo “na iya ba da ƙarfi ga ɗalibai su zama masu zurfin bincike da mahimmanci; ta hanyar ba da amsa da sauri game da kayan yanar gizo, ɗalibai na iya ayyana matsayinsu a cikin mahallin sauran rubuce-rubucen tare kuma da fitar da nasu hangen nesa kan wasu batutuwan musamman (Oravec, 2002).

src: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others. It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information. In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998) The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times. Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.

src: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry. Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits. But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?

src: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle. Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long. In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
mt: Kirby Muxloe Castle, wanda ya kasance mai yiwuwa a lokacin, yana da yawa kuma yana da gida mai tsaro kamar gida mai tsaro. Masu tsaron gida na da cibiyoyi masu zane da ƙasa mai tsari wanda ba zai iya yin tsayawa ga hanci ba don sa'a. A cikin 1480s, lokacin da aka fara gina shi ta Lord Hastings, kasar ta kasance cikin zaman lafiya da tsaro kawai ya shafe a hannun manyan gungun marayoyi masu tsawon zafi.
ref: Kamar yadda ya ke a zamanin, Fadar Kirby Muxloe Castle yafi kama zagayayyen gida maimakon haƙiƙar fada. A cikin 1480s, lokacin da Lord Hastings ya fara ginin, ƙasar ta kasance cikin kwanciyar hankali kuma ana buƙatar kariya ne kawai daga ƙananan ƙungiyoyin masu satar hanya.

src: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle. Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long. In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.

src: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity. Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards. Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.

src: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University). In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals. In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis. Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI. In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
mt: MRI yana da alaka da al'adar fannin kimiyyar kasa da kasa ta kira nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), wanda aka samu a shekarun 1930 ta Felix Bloch (wanda yake a Jami'ar Stanford) da Edward Purcell (daga Jami'ar Harvard). A wannan resonance, sashe da radio waves za su iya yin kwayoyin radio daidai. A shekarar 1970, Raymond Damadian, marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi marigayi
ref: MRI ya danganta ne ga faruwar kimiyyar lissafi da ake kira rawar makaman nukiliya wato Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR), wanda Felix Bloch ya gano a shekarun 1930 (yayin da ya ke aiki a Jami’ar Stanford) da Edward Purcell (daga Jami’ar Harvard). A wannan jijjigar, sararin maganaɗiso da kuma sautin rediyo suna sanya ƙwayoyin zarra su ba da ƙananan sigina na rediyo. A shekara ta 1970, Raymond Damadian, likita kuma masanin kimiyya mai bincike, ya gano madogarar amfani da hton rawar magnet wato magnetic resonance imaging a matsayin kayan aiki don gano cuta a asibiti. Bayan shekaru hudu an ba da izini lambar mallakar kira, wanda shi ne farkon lambar kira a duniya da aka bayar a cikin fannin MRI. A shekarar 1977 ne, Dr. Damadian ya kammala aikin kirkirar na’urar MRI ta farko a tarihi, wadda ya kira da “gagara misali”.

src: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others. That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire. Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions. For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car. He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.

Ya kamata a yi masa adalci kasancewar ya jefar da mukullan motarsa ne sakamakon haka ya ke kokarin balle kofar motar tasa.

src: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others. That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire. Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions. For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car. He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.

src: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine. Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior. Examples include control, planning and scheduling, the ability to answer customer diagnoses and questions, as well as handwriting recognition, voice and face. Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems. The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.

ref: Kodayake AI yana da ƙarfin ƙarin ma'anar almara ta kimiyya, AI ya kasance wani reshe na kimiyyar kwamfuta mai matuƙar muhimmanci, da ke mu'amala da halayya, koyo da kuma shigar da fasahar ƙwaƙwalwa a cikin inji. Bincike a kan na’urorin mutum mutumi ya jibanci saka na’urori aiki wanda ke bukatar basira kafin aikata su. Misalai sun hada da sarrafawa, shiryawa da tanadi, iya amsa tambayoyi da ganewar asali na abokan ciniki, tare da gane rubutun hannu, murya da fuska. Irin waɗannan abubuwa sun zama horo daban, waɗanda ke mai da hankali kan samar da mafita ga matsalolin rayuwa. Yawacin lokuta ana amfani da tsarin AI a bangarorin tattalin arziki, likitanci, injiniya da sojoji, kamar yadda aka gina cikin ɗimbin komfuta na gida da bidiyon softwaya na mahanjar wasa.

src: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution. The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information. The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong. This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures. People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
mt: Patterns of thinking that converge are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution. The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information. The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong. This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures. People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
ref: Tsarin tunani mai canzawa dabaru ne na warware matsaloli waɗanda ke haɗa ra'ayoyi daban-daban ko fannoni don nemo mafita. Abinda tunaninka zai mai da hankali kai su ne, sauri, fikira da dacewa, tabbatar da gaskiyar zance, sake yin amfani da dabaru da ake da su na tattara bayanai. Abu mafi mahimmanci a wannan tunanin shine: amsa guda daya ce kawai ta ke daidai. Kuna tunanin amsoshi biyu ne kawai, su ne daidai ne ko ba daidai ba. Irin wannan tunanin ana nasabta shi ne da wani tsarin kimiyya ko kuma tabbatattun tsare-tsare. Mutane masu irin wannan tunanin na da basirar tunani, suna iya hardace tsari, su warware matsaloli kuma su yi aiki akan gwaje-gwajen kimiyya.

src: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds. In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly. Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately. He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
mt: Amfani da yin watsa labarai na video ya haifar da gudummawar daidai a cikin tafsirin micro-expressions, yadda yake a cikin shekaru masu yawa. A cikin binciken, an bayyana cewa za a iya gano ko wani mutum ya yi watsa labarai ta hanyar tafsirin micro-expressions daidai. Oliver Sacks, a cikin littafinsa The President's Speech, ya bayyana cewa mutane da ke cikin matsalolin daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai suna da damar yin watsa labarai daidai. Ya bayyana cewa za a iya samun wannan damar a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin kai daidai a cikin tsarin k
ref: Amfani da rikodin bidiyo ya haifar da bincike mai mahimmanci a cikin fassara bayanan fuska, motsin fuska waɗanda ba sa wuce lokaci ƙalilan. Musamman ma kamar, ikirarin da ya yi cewa zai gano ko mutum yana karyar fassarar/fahimtar kananan maganganu yadda suke. A cikin takardar shi mai take Jawabin Shugaba Oliver Sacks ya bayyana yadda mutane dake fuskantar masala wajen fahimtar jawabi bisa ga masalar tabin kwakwalwa, yace duk da haka suna iya fahimtar gaskiya daidai. Har ma yana ba da shawarar cewa irin waɗannan damar a fassara halayen mutane za su iya rabawa ta dabbobi kamar su karnukan gida.

src: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed. The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus. In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.

src: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication. The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach. For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995). “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
mt: Internet yana da yawa daga cikin yadda masu yin amfani da shi ke amfani da shi. Bayanin da ke cikin Internet suna da bayyana a cikin yadda masu yin amfani da shi ke amfani da shi. Misali, "gudanar da karatu" da "tattalin arziki" an sanya su a matsayin motar amfani da yawa don amfani da Internet (James da sauran, 1995). "Muhimman amfani" da "ci gaba da alaƙa" an sanya su a matsayin motar amfani da yawa da Eighmey da McCord (1998) suka yi bincike a kan yadda masu yin amfani da shi ke amfani da shi.
ref: Yanar gizo ta hada abubuwa biyu na sadarwar tsakanin al’umma da daidaikun mutane. Kyakyawan halaye na intanet suna haifar da karin girma dangane da matakan gamsarwa. Alal misali, “koyo” da “cudanya” ana kallonsu a matsayin muhimman hanyoyin ƙarfafa yin amfani da yanar gizo (James et al., 1995). “Shiga cikin mutum” da “ci gaba da dangantaka” na cikin sabbin fannonin kwarin gwiwa ta Eighmey da McCord (1998) yayinda suka bincika daukin masu sauraro a gidajen yanar gizo.

src: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication. The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach. For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995). “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
mt: Internet yana da yawa daga cikin yadda masu yin amfani da shi ke amfani da shi. Bayanin da ke cikin Internet suna da bayyana a cikin yadda masu yin amfani da shi ke amfani da shi. Misali, "gudanar da karatu" da "tattalin arziki" an sanya su a matsayin motar amfani da yawa don amfani da Internet (James da sauran, 1995). src: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century. At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east. However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year. towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.

src: We can start living more friendly to the environment, we can join to the environmental movement, and we can even be activists in order to reduce the future suffering in some degree. This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them. It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
mt: Zan san san da zan iya rayuwa da kyau ga muhalli, zan shiga cikin yakin muhalli, da kuma zan iya zama mai yakin muhalli don rage matsalolin da ke faruwa a cikin wani mataki. Wannan shine kamar yadda aikin ilmantarwa a yau a yau. Amma idan muka san cewa muka yi aikin ilmantarwa a matsayin aikin yau, to muka san cewa muka yi aikin ilmantarwa a matsayin aikin yau. Wannan ya zama wani abu mai kyau da yawa cewa duniya ta fuskanci matsala da yawa saboda ci gaban kimiyya da fasaha na ɗan adam, da kuma matsalolin da ke faruwa saboda yawan jama'a da rayuwar ɗan adam mai ƙarfi.
ref: Za mu iya fara zaman nuna sabo ga muhalli, za mu iya shiga cikin yunƙurin inganta muhalli, kuma mu kan iya zama ‘yan gwagwarmaya don rage wahala nan gaba a wani mataki. Wannan kamar magani ne na alamun cuta a lokuta da yawa. Koyaya, idan ba kawai muna son magancewa ta ɗan lokaci ba ne, to ya kamata mu samo tushen matsalolin, kuma mu kashe su. A bayyane ya ke cewa duniya ta canza sosai saboda ci gaban Dan Adam a fannonin kimiyya da fasaha, kuma matsaloli sun karu sosai sakamakon yawan jama’a da halayyar mutane ta almubazzaranci.

src: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states. The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance. The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power. This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
mt: Wasuwar tsayawa ta kula da kudirin ita ce babban kayayyakin da yawa na kasashe na Turai suka yi. Manufar ita ce cewa duk ƙasashen Turai dole ne su nemi hana wata ƙasa ta zama mai ƙarfi, don haka gwamnatocin ƙasashe sau da yawa sukan canza ƙawancensu don kiyaye daidaito. src: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny. For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner. One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason. The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
mt: A lokacin tarihi na Turai, al'ummar Katolika, wanda ya zama ruwan dawo da girma, ya kasance a cikin kwazonsu. Don tsawon shekaru sama da al'umma ta yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda
ref: A wannan lokaci na tarihin Tarayyan Turai, cocin Katolika, wadda ta yi karfi da arziki, ta fuskanci bincike. Sama da shekara dubu addinin Kirista ya haɗe kasashen Turai waje guda duk da banbance banbance na harsuna da ala’adu. Karfin barnansa ta shafe kowa daga sarki har na gama-gari. Daya daga cikin shishikan addinin krista shine yin amfani da arziki wajen magance matsaloli da kuma yakar talauci sannan kuma jami’in kudi na cocin suna can musamman saboda wannan dalilin. Babban cibiyar shugabancin coci ta kasance a Roma sama da dubban shekaru kuma mayar da arziki da mulki can ya jawo cece-kuce game da ko ana bin wannan shikashikin.

src: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women. In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen. The mob of people forced the King And Queen to have their carriage windows wide open. At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
mt: Shugaban Louis XVI, Marie Antoinette da yara biyar su (11 shekarun Marie Therese da shekaru 4 Louis-Charles) da 'yar'uwar shugaba, Madame Elizabeth, a ranar 6 ga watan Oktoba 1789 an kawo su Paris daga Versailles ta jama'a masu tsoro. A cikin jirgin, suka tafi Paris ta jama'a masu tsoro da suka yi tsokanci da tsokanci game da shugaban da 'yar'uwar. Jama'a masu tsoro sun kawo jirgin shugaban da 'yar'uwar suka yi tsayawa da tsayawa. A wani lokaci, wani memba na jama'a ya kawo bugun bugun na gwagwarmayar da aka kashe a Versailles a hadin kai da 'yar'uwar tsoro.
ref: A firgice Sarki Louis da Sarauniya Marie Antoinette da yayansu guda biyu (Marie yar shekaru 11 da kuma Louis-Charles dan shekara hudu) da kuma yar'uwar Sarki, Madam Elizabeth, wadanda matan kasuwa masu bore a ranar 6 ga watan Oktoba 1789 sun tilasta musu komawa birnin Faris daga garin Versailles. A cikin tarago, suka koma zuwa Paris zagaye da wasu gungun mutane da ke ihu suna kalaman barazanar a kan Sarki da Sarauniya. Abokai masu nisa, ba tare da wayar tarho ba, wayar tauraron dan adam zata iya zama mai zaɓar. A wata lokaci memba na yan zanga-zanga shugaban wata sarauta tsarewa sun kashe wata Versailles a gaban Sarauniya mai firgita.

src: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany. The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries. Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships. Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
mt: Bayan fitowar yakin, Birtaniya ta fara yakin kashe gobara a kan Jamus. Tattalin arziki ya kasance cikin alherbi, inda ya kawo kudade masu yawa ga sojojin da kuma al'umma, amma wannan yakin ya tsaya a kan doka ta duniya da aka kafa ta hanyoyi da dama a cikin shekaru biyar na baya. src: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany. The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries. Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships. Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.

src: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults. MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve. Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.

src: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers. Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions. Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.

src: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition. The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.
mt: Wasannin zamani na fensin ana buga a matsayin wasannin da yawa, daga daliban da suke koyarwa a jami'a zuwa wasannin proffesional da Olympics. Wasannin ya kasance ana buga shi a matsayin wasannin daidai, wanda daya daga cikin fensin ya buga wasa da wani.
ref: Wasan takobi na zamani ya na da matakai daban daban, kama daga dalibai masu koyo a jami’a zuwa ga kwararru da kuma na gasar olympic. Ana buga wasan yawanci a wani tsarin gwagwarmaya, wani mai wasan takobi yana gogawa da wani.

src: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made. src: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler. Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed. Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber. The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.
mt: Yayin da yake da yawa daga cikin tasirin zamantakewa da siyasa kamar yadda yake amfani da tsarin metrika, ciyawa daga absulutism zuwa jamhuriyya, nasarar kasa da kuma shugabancin cewa kasa ba tare da daya ba ne amma a matsayin mutane. Haka kuma bayan yakin basasar Faransa, ayyuka suna da gudunmawar ga duk mutane masu karfi da masu yawa wanda zai iya samun nasara. Yayin da yake da yawa daga cikin tasirin sojojin kuma saboda yadda yake rangin sojojin ba tare da matsayin jinsi ba ne amma a matsayin cailaber. Yakin basasar Faransa kuma ya sa mutane masu yawa daga cikin jama'a masu tashe da kuma masu tashe na kasashen waje da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe da kuma masu tashe
ref: Akwai tasiri na zamantakewa da siyasa masu yawa kamar amfani da tsarin awo cikakke, barin kama-karya zuwa jamhuriyya, kishin ƙasa tare da imanin cewa ƙasar ta mutanen ƙasa ce ba mutum ɗaya mai mulki ba. Hakanan bayan juyin halin an bude ayyuka ga duk maza masu neman aiki inda hakan ya bada dama ga masu buri da kokari su sami cigaba. Hakanan ya kasance ga sojoji saboda maimakon martaba sojoji ya kasance bisa la'akari da aji sai yanzu suka dogara da cailaber. Juyin Juya Hali na Faransa ya kuma ba sauran wasu mutane masu tsananin karfi na wata ƙasa damar fara nasu juyin juya halin.

src: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler. Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed. Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber. The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.

src: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems. In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down. Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?

ref: Kowa yana shiga cikin jama'a kuma yana amfani da tsarin sufuri. Kusan kowa yana korafi game da tsarin sufuri. A kasashen da suka ci gaba ba kasafai ake jin irin wannan korafin ba game da ingancin ruwa ko gadoji da ke faduwa. Me yasa tsarukan sufuri su ke haifar da irin waɗannan ƙorafi, me ya sa suke faɗuwa a kullum? Shin injiniyoyin sufuri ne kawai ba ƙwararru ba? Ko akwai wani mahimmin abu di ke faruwa ne?

src: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems. In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down. Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
mt: Har yanzu duk wani yanki na al'umma ke amfani da kayayyakin sadarwa. Kusan duk wani yanki yana magance kan kayayyakin sadarwa. src: Traffic Flow is the study of the movement of individual drivers and vehicles between two points and the interactions they make with one another. Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty. Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically. To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity. These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.
mt: Shirin jirgin kasa na nazarin tsawon jirgin kasa da motocin da suka tashi tsakanin biyu na gaba da yadda suka yi tare da juna. Duk da haka, nazarin shirin jirgin kasa ba za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya bayyana ta yadda za a iya
ref: Gudanar Zirga-zirga shine nazari kan zirga-zirgar ɗaiɗaikun direbobi da ababen hawa tsakanin wurare biyu tare da ma’amala da suke yi da juna. Abin takaici, bincikawar zirga-zirga ababen hawa abu ne mai wahala saboda ba’a iya yin hasashen hakikanci halin direba dari bisa dari. An yi sa'a, direbobi su na tuki a cikin nutsuwa yadda kwararar ababen hawa a titi ke tafiya a natse don haka ana iya nazarin yanayin ta hanyar lissafi. Domin gabatar da yanayin hanya, an kulla alaƙa tsakanin muhimman al’amura uku: (1) gudana, (2) cinkoso da (3) watsuwa. Wadannan dangantaka suna taimakawa wajen tsari, zayyana, da kuma gudanar da kayayyakin babbar hanya.

src: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material. Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium. They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
mt: Shirin Hershey da Chase na daya daga cikin sanannun bayanai da suka nuna cewa DNA shine matakin genetik. Hershey da Chase suna amfani da phages, ko virus, don shigar da DNA na suka tsira a cikin bakteriyoyi. Sun yi biyun shirye-shiryen da suka sanya DNA a cikin phage da iskar radiyo phosphorus ko protein na phage da iskar radiyo sulfur.
ref: Gwajin Hershey da Chase na ɗaya daga cikin ra’ayoyin da ke kan gaba da ke nuni da cewa DNA wani abu ne na rayuwa. Hershey da Chase sun yi amfani da phages, ko ƙwayoyin cututtuka, wajen shigar da sinadarin DNA nasu a cikin wata ƙwayar cuta. Sunyi gwaje-gwaje guda biyu wanda ke nuna alamar ko DNA a cikin fage tare da phosphorus na rediyoaktif ko furotin na phage tare da sulfur na rediyo.

src: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells. Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.

src: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran. Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins. Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.

Al’adu da ƙabilun zamanin da ne su ka fara adana su domin sauƙin samun madara, gashi, nama, da kuma fatu. A koyaushe ana ajiye awakin gida a cikin garken shanun da ke yawo a kan tsaunuka ko wasu wuraren kiwo, galibi masu kiwon awaki waɗanda yara da samari ne ke kula da su, kwatankwacin sanannen makiyayi. Wadannan hanyoyin kiwo har yanzu ana amfani dasu.

src: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes. Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth. The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins. The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
mt: Golf ƙwallon ƙwallon ne wanda masu wasa ke amfani da ƙwallaye don ɗaure ƙwallaye a cikin ƙwallaye. Yayin wasa, masu wasa ke ɗaure ƙwallaye a cikin ƙwallaye 18, tare da masu wasa ke yin ƙwallaye a cikin ƙwallaye na farko a cikin ƙwallaye da kuma ƙwallaye a cikin ƙwallaye. Wanda ya ɗaure ƙwallaye a cikin ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙwallaye ƙ
ref: Golf wani wasa ne da ƴan wasan ke amfani da sanduna domin buga ƙwallaye zuwa cikin ramuka. An buga ramuka goma sha takwas yayin zagaye na yau da kullun, tare da yan wasa galibi suna farawa akan rami na farko akan kwas ɗin kuma suna gamawa a ranar goma sha takwas. Ɗan wasan da ya ɗauki ƙarancin bugu, ko kuma jefin kulkin, don kammala sashen yake samu nasara. Akan buga wasan ne a kan ciyawa, inda a ke sassabe ciyawar da ke zagayen ramin wanda a ke kira kore.

src: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research. It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.

src: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research. It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.

src: Tornadoes strike a small area compared to other violent storms, but they can destroy everything in their path. Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours. These monster storms have winds up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).

src: Muhammad was deeply interested in matters beyond this mundane life. He used to frequent a cave that became known as “Hira‘” on the Mountain of “Noor” (light) for contemplation. he cave itself, which survived the times, gives a very vivid image of Muhammad’s spiritual inclinations. Resting on the top of one of the mountains north of Mecca, the cave is completely isolated from the rest of the world. In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation. Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.
mt: Muhammad ya yi sha’awar daidai da al’amura da ke kusa da rayuwar al’ama. Ya yi yawa a kusa da wani gandu wanda aka san shi da “Hira‘” a kan tsaunin “Noor” (nuna) don tattaunawa. Gandun kanta, wanda ya ci gaba da lokuta, ya ba mu hanyar ta ban tsoro ta Muhammad ta bincike. A kusa da tsaunin daya daga arewacin Makkah, gandun ya kasance mai tsaka-tsakin daga duniya. Yanzu, ba za a iya gani ba kuma ba za a iya gani ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba ba tare da yin tunanin ba
ref: Muhammadu yana matukar sha'awar al'amuran da suka wuce rayuwar wannan duniya. Ya na yawan ziyarar kogon da a ka fi sani da na “Hira” a tsaunin “Noor” (wato haske) domin kadaicewa yayi tunani. ya ɓoye kansa, wanda ya rayu a lokacin, yana ba da hoton karkatawar ruhaniyar Muhammad a tsarari. Kasancewa a saman ɗayan duwatsun arewacin Makka, kogon ya zama ya keɓe daga sauran duniya. A hakika akwai matukar wahalar gano wajen ko ma ka idan ka san ya kasance. Kana shiga cikin kogon zaka ji kadaita ta kama ka. Babu abin da za a iya gani face kyakkyawan sararin samaniya da tsaunuka masu yawa da ke kewayen. Baka iya ji ko ganin wadannan daga cikin kogon.

src: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century. Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day. Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top. This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons. Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.

src: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel. In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
mt: Romanticism ya samu yanki mai yawa na yadda al'umma ke zama, wanda aka samu daga masu rubutu kamar Goethe, Fichte, da Schlegel. A cikin Romanticism, tattalin arziki ya haifar da mutane, da kuma a lokuta masu alaka da wannan tattalin arziki sun samo asali, da kuma wannan, wanda ke cikin haɗin kai da wuri na al'umma, ya fi yadda dokokin da aka shirya ba tare da wani abu ba.
ref: Tsarin fasaha da adabi samar da al’adu, wanda marubuta irinsu Gothe, Fichte da Schlegel su ka samar. A cikin siyakin romanci, yanayin kasa ya canza mutane, kuma lokaci da yawa sai al'adu da al'adu masu alaƙa da wannan yanayin suka taso, kuma waɗannan, kasancewar suna jituwa da matsayin jama'a, sun fi ƙa'idodi da aka kafa bisa doka da oda.

src: "Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology. Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has ""effects"" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned. For example, one might say that the motor car necessarily leads to the development of roads. However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership. Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies."

ref: Wanzuwar Fasahar Ƙere-ƙere al’amari ne da ya haɗo wani faffaɗan fage na ra’ayoyi a aikace, daga bunƙasar fasaha ko muhimmancin fasahar ƙere-ƙere zuwa ga haƙiƙanin sanin cewa makomar dan adam tana tafiya ne bisa tabbatacciyar hikima wadda ke da alaƙa da dokokin kimiyya da kuma bayyanar su a cikin fasahar ƙere-ƙere. Yawancin fassarar tabbatuwar fasahar zamani sun kunshi ra’ayi mafiya yaduwa guda biyu: cewa na fasaha ita kanta na bin tafarki wacce ta sha bamban da tasirin al’ada ko siyasa da kuma cewa fasaha nada “tasiri” ga al’umma masu asali, fiye da na tsarin yanayin zamantakewa. Misali, mutum na iya cewa motar tilas ba zata haifar da ci gaban hanyoyi ba. Koyaya, hanyar sadarwa ta ƙasa gabaɗaya ba ta da tasirin tattalin arziƙi don ƙarancin motoci, saboda haka ana ƙirƙirar sabbin hanyoyin samarwa don rage farashin mallakar mota. Hakanan mallakar motoci da yawa yana haifar da yawan hadari a kan hanyoyi, wanda ke haifar da kirkirar sabbin dabaru a fannin kiwon lafiya don gyaran jikin da ya lalace.

src: "The ""up bow"" mark looks like a V and the ""down bow mark"" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side. Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow. An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive. src: Unlike other primates, hominids no longer use their hands in locomotion or bearing weight or swinging through the trees. The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking. The human hand is shorter than the foot, with straighter phalanges. Fossil hand bones two million to three million years old reveal this shift in specialization of the hand from locomotion to manipulation.
mt: Ba aiyaye na kwayoyin halitta, hominids ba su amfani da hannu a cikin tafiya ko yin amfani da kai ko tashi a cikin tsaunuka. Tsakanin hannun chimpanzee da kai suna da yawa da tsawon, wanda ke nuna amfani da hannu a yin amfani da kai a tafiya a cikin tsaunuka. Hannun mutum mai tsawon kuma mai tsawon, hannun phalanges mai tsawon. Tsakanin kwayoyin halitta na hannu da tsawon miliyan biyu zuwa miliyan biyu da tsawon suna nuna canjin aikin hannu daga tafiya zuwa amfani.
ref: Ba kamar sauran birrai ba, hominids baya amfani da hannayensu a cikin motsi ko ɗaukar nauyi ko jujjuyawa ta cikin bishiyoyi. Hannun chimpanzee da ƙafa sun yi daidai da girma da tsayi, suna nuna amfanin hannun don ɗaukar nauyi a cikin yatsan ƙafa. Hannun dan adam ya fi kafa gajarta, da kasusuwa miƙaƙƙu. Busassun kasussuwan hannu wanda ke da shekaru miliyan biyu zuwa miliyan uku sun nunna wannan matsawa a kwarewa na hannun daga tafiya zuwa tasiri kan sarrafawa.

src: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed. Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation. Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.

src: "Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources. Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death. The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked. In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids. All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their ""protein problem"" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today."
mt: "A cikin savanna, babu wani nau'in tsuntsu da tsarin zafin jiki kamar na mutane don cika bukatar amino-acid daga kayan aiki masu yin amfani. Sakamakon haka, rashin cikakken yadda za a cika bukatar daidai ya haifar da matsalolin girma, rashin lafiya, da kuma kusan rasuwa. Kayan aiki masu yin amfani mafi yawan yadda za a iya samun su zai kasance kayan aiki masu yin amfani da ke cikin shanu da kayan aiki masu yin amfani, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki, amma za a iya zafin jiki,
ref: A can cikin yankin savanna, yana da wahala ga wata halitta dangin biri da ke da tsarin narkewar abinci irin na mutum ta iya gamsar da buƙatunta na sinadarin amino daga albarkatun tsirrai da ake da su. Bugu da ƙari, ƙin yin hakan yana tattare da munanan sakamako:kamar rashin yin girma, rashin abinci mai gina jiki, da kuma a karshe mutuwa. Ma’dinan tsirrai da aka fi saurin amfani da su sun kasance sunadaran gina jiki da za'a iya samu a ganye da ƙwaya, amma waɗannan suna da tauri ga halittu irin mu wajen narkewa har sai an dafa su. Sabanin haka, abincin dabbobi (tururuwa, gara, ƙwai) ba kawai ana iya narkewa cikin sauƙi ba, amma suna samar da sunadarai masu yawa waɗanda ke ɗauke da dukkan muhimman amino acid. In an yi la’akari da dukkan abubuwa, bai kamata mu yi mamaki ba idan magabatanmu suka magance “matsalar kayan gina jiki” ta irin hanyar da goggon biri a yankin savanna suke yi a yau.

src: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity. Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members. The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors. Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
mt: Subcultures na kawo cikas da mutane masu ra'ayoyi iri ɗaya waɗanda suke so a cikin al'umma daidai da suke iya haɗin kai. Subcultures na iya zama ɗanɗano saboda yara, asalin, ƙasa, ƙasa, da/ko jinsi na membobin. Abubuwan da ke ɗaukar subculture a matsayin ɗanɗano zaka iya zama zane, ayyuka, addinin siyasa, jinsi, gundumar, ko haɗin gwiwar abubuwa. Membobin subculture adawa su nuna ayyukansu ta hanyar amfani da ƙarfi, wanda ke taɓaɓɓuwa daidaitattun fasahar, ayyuka, da argot.
ref: Rassan al’adu suna sada mutane masu tunani iri daya da suke ji tsarin rayuwa na al’umma bai dace da su ba inda suke ba su damar ganin suna da muhimanci a al’umma. Ana iya bambanta kananan al’adu saboda shekara, bangarenci na jama’a, matsayi cikin al’umma, guri, da/ko kuma jintsin membobi. Kyawawan siffofin da suke tabbatar da wata ƙaramar al’ada a matsayin wadda ta fita daban kan iya kasancewa na yare, kyau, addini, siyasa, jinsi, na yanki, ko hadin abubuwa. Membobin masana'antar sau da yawa suna nuna alamar kasancewa memba ta hanyar rarrabe mai amfani da alama ta salon, wanda ya haɗa da salon, halayen kirki, da ɗaukar hoto.

src: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior. For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.

src: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior. For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.

Alal misali, yaran da suke daga tsirarun kabilun da ake yi wa kallon basa wani abin kirki a makaranta akwai yiwuwar hakan ya dakushe himmarsu a makaranta da zarar sun fahimci cewa ana musu wani kallon-kallo saboda launin fatarsu.

src: "One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up. Such children are called ""feral"" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment. Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away. Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own. When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans."
mt: "Wani daya daga cikin yadda masu kira aiki ke nuna yadda muhimmanci ne a cikin zamantakar jama'a, ya kamata a dauke da wadanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron, ta hanyar tsoron, ko ta hanyar yin aiki, wanda aka kawo su a cikin wani lokaci, ta hanyar tsoron
ref: Daya daga cikin matakan da ake amfani dashi domin nuna muhimmacin zamantakewa shine nuna kadan daga cikin hali na takaici wanda yara suka fuskanta, ta hanyar sakaci, masifa, ko cin zarafi, kuma basu zamantakewa da manya ba yayin da suke girma. Ana kiran irin waɗannan yaran “sakakku” ko masu wuyar juyawa. Mutane sun sha kulle waɗansu sakakkun yara (yawanci iyayensu ne); a wasu al’amuran kuma barin yaran na da alaƙa da ƙin amincewar iyaye da naƙasar basira ko ta jikin yaro. Yaran mara zuciya masu jin tsoro na iya fuskantar mummunan cin zarafin yara ko rauni kafin a watsar da su ko su gudu. Wasu ana zargin dabbobi ne suka yi rainon su; an ce wasu sun yi rayuwa a daji da kansu. Lokacin da ba dabba ba ta dabbaro gabaɗaya, yaro mai ɗaukar hoto yana nuna halayensa (a cikin iyakokin zahiri) kusan gaba daya kamar na kulawar-dabbobi, kamar tsoron sa ko rashin kulawa ga mutane.

src: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family. Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield. Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.

A tarihance mafi yawan manoma sun kasance suna aikin noma kuma wannan har yanzu haka lamarin yake a yawancin ƙasashe masu tasowa.

src: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism. This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun. Beaches, theme parks and camp grounds are often the most common places frequented by recreational tourists. If the objective of one’s visit to a particular place is to get to know its history and culture then this type of tourism is known as cultural tourism. Tourists may visit different landmarks of a particular country or they may simply opt to focus on just one area.
mt: Idan abin da aka yi a wani wuri shine yin nazarin tarihin da al'ummar ta, wannan nau'in tattalin arziki shine tattalin arziki. Turai masu tafiya zai ziyarci kayan tarihi na ƙasa ko kuma zasu ƙarewa a ɗayan yanki.
ref: Watakila yawon bude ido da aka fi sani shi ne wanda mutane ke alakantawa da tafiya: Yawon bude ido don nishaɗi. Yanzu ne lokacin da mutane ke zuwa wani waje daban da irin wanda su ka saba yau da gobe domin hutawa da annashuwa. Bakin tekuna, filin shakatawa da zangon hutawa su ne mafi wuraren da baki masu yawon bude ido ke fi zuwa. Idan makasudin ziyarar mutum zuwa wani wuri shi ne sanin tarihinta da al'adunta to wannan nau'in yawon shakatawa an san shi da yawon bude ido game da al'adu. Masu yawon bude ido na iya ziyartan alamar kasa dabam-dabam na wata kasa ko kuma suna iya mai da hankali waje daya.

src: Individuals who had been involved for several decades helped us appreciate our strengths and passions while candidly assessing difficulties and even failures. While listening to individuals share their individual, family, and organizational stories, we gained valuable insight into the past and some of the personalities who influenced for good or ill the culture of the organization. While understanding one’s history does not assume understanding of culture, it does at least help people gain a sense of where they fall within the history of the organization. While assessing the successes and becoming aware of failures, individuals and the whole of the participating persons discover more deeply the values, mission, and driving forces of the organization. In this instance, recalling previous instances of entrepreneurial behavior and resulting successes helped people to be open to new changes and new direction for the local church. Such success stories lessened the fears of change, while creating positive inclinations toward change in the future.

ref: Mutune da suka kasance a lamarin cikin gomman shekaru sun taimake mu wajen fahimtar karfinmu da kuma jarabarmu yayin da kuma muke la’akari da wahalhalun da ke ciki har ma da matsalolin ciki. Yayin sauraren kowa da kowa yana bayar da labaran kansa ko na iyali da kuma na wuraren aiki/kungiya, muna samun muhimman bayanai da suka gabata na mutanen da suka yi tasiri ta hanya mai kyau ko akasin haka game da tsari ko dabi’un kungiya/wurin aiki. Yayin fahimtar tarihin wani ba a daukar fahimtar aladun, ya kan taimakawa mutane wajan gane a gurbin da suke a tarihin maaikatar. Yayin auna cigaban da aka samu tare da fahimtar gazawa, ɗaiɗaikun mutane tare da duk waɗanda suke cikin shirin sun ƙara gano darajoji, manufa, da kuma al’amuran da ke tafiyar da ma’aikatar. A wannan misalin, tuna wasu misalan da suka gabata na halayyar kirkire-kirkire da kuma nasarar da suka haifar ya taimakawa mutane wajen fahimtar sabbin sauye-sauyen da kuma alkiblar cocin wurin. Wadannan labaran nasarorin sun sassauta girman fargabar sauyin, yayin da yake saka tunanin sauyin da za a iya samu a gaba.

src: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn. In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented. Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point. So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge. We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.
mt: Yadda ake koyarwa a zamanin postmodern yana ba da azanci daga abubuwan da ba a daidaita ba. src: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn. In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented. Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point. So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge. We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.

src: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes). This can be easily done by using a relatively quiet alarm clock to bring you to consciousness without fully waking you. If you find yourself resetting the clock in your sleep, it can be placed on the other side of the room, forcing you to get out of bed to turn it off. Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.

src: Some people believe that experiencing many artificially induced lucid dreams often enough can be very exhausting. The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states. With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem. This is just as exhausting as if you were to wake up every twenty or thirty minutes and watch TV. The effect is dependent on how often your brain attempts to lucidly dream per night.
