src: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos. Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films. Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.
mt: Yanzu, masu amfani da fayilai na yau da kullun suna amfani da kayan aiki na kayan aiki don amfani da kayan aiki da kayan aiki. Animations masu mahimmanci na iya kirkirar a cikin kayan aiki, da wannan nau'in kirkirar yana yadu a cikin talakawan da fina-finai. Muziki yanzu ana yin sa ta hanyar kayan aiki masu mahimmanci don gudanar da daidaitattun kayan aiki da kayan aiki.
ref: A zamanin yanzu ana amfani da kwamfutoci wajen jirkita hotuna da bidiyoyi. Zane-zane masu kayatarwa za a iya samun su a kwamfutoci, kuma irin wadannan zane-zanen suna ci gaba da samun karbuwa a telebijin da finafinai. Ana yin rikodin waƙoƙi sau da yawa ta amfani da ƙwararrun kwamfutoci don sarrafawa da haɗa sautuka tare.

src: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
mt: Birnin Harappa da Mohenjo-daro suna da wucewa a kowane gida, daidai da tsarin tafiyar ruwa mai zurfi. Yayin da aka samu tsarin tafiyar ruwa a cikin biranen Minoan na Crete da Santorini a Greece. Akwai kuma wucewa a Masar, Iran da Sin. A tsarin Romawa, wucewa za a iya zama ɗayan sassa na gidan bauta na jama'a inda maza da mata za su taka muhimmiyar rawa tare.
ref: Biranen Harappa da Mohenjo-daro suna da banɗaki mai ruwa a kusan kowane gida, wanda su ke haɗe wani kyakkyawa tsarin magudanar najasa. An samo ragowar tsarin shara a gidajen biranen Minoan na Crete da Santorini da ke Girka. Hakanan akwai bandakuna a zamanin d Misira, Farisa da China. A cikin wayewar Roman, wasu lokuta bayan gida wani bangare ne na gidajen wanka na jama'a inda maza da mata suke tare a cikin haɗin gwiwa.

src: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves. This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.

ref: Karfe da ke kan takalman zamani na wasa a kankara na da baki biyu da buɗaɗɗen rami tsakanin su. Gefen biyun suna ba da izini don kyakkyawan kamu kankaran, koda kuwa an goge shi. Saboda wukar ta dan lankwashe daga kasanta, yayinda wajen kaifin ya karkace dag nan zuwa can, tsinin wanda ya taba kankarar shi ma ya dan lankwashe. Wannan yana sa skater ya juya. Idan skates suka yi hagu zuwa dama, skater din tayi dama, idan skates dinsu yi hagu zuwa hagu, skater din sai ya juya hagu.

src: "To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a ""photon"". Scientists call this process ""stimulated emission of radiation"" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!"
mt: "Don yin dawowar zuwa matsayinsu na kowane lokaci, za su iya rufe kwayoyin halitta da suka samu daga cikin kwayoyin halitta. Suna yin wannan ta hanyar sakin wani ɗan ƙaramin hasken wuta da ake kira “photon”. src: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
mt: Bayan daaka daga cikin sa'o'i na aiki filin a cikin bulb a karshe ya tara da kuma bulb ba ta aiki ba. An gama yin bulb ya zama dole. src: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.

src: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.

Tsage tsakiya kuma sannan ya saki wasu daga cikin wannan kuzari. Wasu kwayar zarra suna da nuclei mai canzawa wanda ya nuna cewa suna iya rabewa da ‘yar ƙarfafawa ko babu .

src: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly. The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view. It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
mt: Idan za ku gurfan wani wuri da yawa na milsawa, za ku amfani da wata jirgin sama. Jirgin sama a cikin zafi ya gurfana da kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taimaka da shi, kuma ya taim
ref: Lokacin da kuka kira wanda yake da nisan duban mil kuna amfani da tauraron dan adam. Tauraron dan adam a sararin samaniya yana samun kira sannan yana nuna shi baya ƙasa, kusan nan take. An aika tauraron dan adam zuwa sararin samaniya ta hanyar roka. Masana kimiyya suna amfani da madubin hangen nesa a sararin samaniya saboda yanayin duniya yana gurbata wasu haskenmu da kallo. Yana daukan katon kunbo fiye da tsawon kafa 100 domin sanya tauraron dan adam ko abin kawo nesa kusa a sararin sama.

src: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.
mt: Ƙarfi shi ne wanda ke yadu a kusa da mu, kuma yana tasiri a duk abin da muka yi, amma yana da yawa don fahimta. Ƙarfi ne aka bincika ta masana addinin, falsafa, da kuma kimiyya don dawama daga alifar zuwa alifar. Muka gani ƙarfi a matsayin sashi na abubuwa wanda ke yadu daga yau zuwa yau zuwa baya. Ƙarfi shi ne yadda muka yi daidaitaccen lokacin (dauke) na abubuwa. Za ku iya yin daidaitaccen ƙarfin ku ta hanyar yin bayani game da yadda abu yake yau. Abin da yake yau shi ne abu wanda ke yadu a kusa da ku.
ref: Lokaci wani abu ne wanda yake kewaye da mu, kuma yana shafan duk abin da muke yi, duk da haka yana da wuyar fahimta. Masana, kama daga na addini, masu falsafa da masana kimiyya sun yi shekaru dubbai su na nazari a kan Lokaci. Muna wayar lokaci a matsayin wani jeri na abubuwan da ke wucewa daga zamani na gaba ta cikin zamanin yanzu zuwa zamanin baya. Wata fassarar ta lokaci ita ce yadda mu ke kwatanta tsawon faruwar wasu abubuwa. Za ka iya ƙayyade wucewar lokaci da kanka ta hanyar dubawa maimaitawaar wani al'amura mai juyawa. Wani al'amura mai juawa wani abu ne da yake faruwa akai-akai ne.

src: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). src: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
mt: Ingila ta samu zaman lafiya bayan da ta kawo karshen Danelaw. Amma a 991 Ethelred ya yi tsanani da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da tawayen tare da t
ref: England ta fuskanci doguwar lokacin salama bayan ta sake karbe iko daga Danelaw. Duk da haka a 991 Ethelred ta fuskanci anobar jirgi mai saukar ungulu wace ta fi kowace girma tun karnin Guthrum baya. Wannan kwambar jiragen ruwan yaƙi ta kasance karkashin jagorancin Olaf Trygvasson, dan kasar Norway da ke da burin ƙwato kasarsa daga danniyar kasar Denmark. Bayan koma bayan soja da aka samu da farko, Ethelred ya sami daidaituwa da Olaf, wanda ya koma Norway domin kokarin kwato masarautar sa, wadda ya sami nasara a wani wajen amma a wani wajen bai samu ba.

src: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."
mt: "A kusa da karni na 15, Estoniya ta arewa ta kasance a cikin tasirin al'adu na Jamus. Monkin Jamus da dama suna cikin girmamawa ga al'ummar asali, don haka sun kirkira harshen Estoniya na litiral. An kafa shi akan haruffan Jamus da wani haruffi "Õ/õ" an sanya. A matsayin lokacin da ya tafi, akwai manyan amfani da dama da aka tura daga Jamus. Wannan ya kasance shi ne farkon yadda al'umma ta zama mai yiwuwa."
ref: A wajejen ƙarni na 15, arewacin Estonia yana ƙarƙashin tasirin al’adu na ƙasar Jamus. Wasu malaman addini na Germany sun so su kawo Allah kusa da mutanen asali, saboda haka suka kirkiro yaren Estonia. Ta sanadiyar harafin Jamusanci kuma an ƙara harafi ɗaya “Õ / õ”. Yayin da zamani ya yi nisa, yawancin kalmomin da aka aro daga Jamusanci sun haɗe. Wannan shi ne farko zamanin wayewa.

A matsayin lokacin da ya tafi, akwai manyan amfani da dama da aka tura daga Jamus. Wannan ya kasance shi ne farkon yadda al'umma ta zama mai yiwuwa."
ref: A wajejen ƙarni na 15, arewacin Estonia yana ƙarƙashin tasirin al’adu na ƙasar Jamus. Wasu malaman addini na Germany sun so su kawo Allah kusa da mutanen asali, saboda haka suka kirkiro yaren Estonia. Ta sanadiyar harafin Jamusanci kuma an ƙara harafi ɗaya “Õ / õ”. Yayin da zamani ya yi nisa, yawancin kalmomin da aka aro daga Jamusanci sun haɗe. Wannan shi ne farko zamanin wayewa.

src: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
mt: An ce akwai yawan mutanen da suka yi magana da Hindi. An yi tsawaita ga tsakanin yaren biyu da na huɗu mafi yawan magana a duniya. Yawan mutanen da suka yi magana da asalin yaren ya bambanta a tsakanin yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da yadda ake kira da
ref: Akwai mabambantan kiyasi na yawan mutanen da ke jin harshen Hindi. An ƙiyasta cewa yana tsakanin harshe na biyu zuwa na hudu cikin yarukan da aka fi amfani da su a duniya. Adadin masu magana da yaren ya bambanta dangane da ko an ƙidaya yaruka masu alaƙa da juna. Kimantawa ta masu magana ta kama daga miliyan 340 zuwa miliyan 500, kuma kusan mutane miliyan 800 ne ke iya fahimtar yaren. Hindi da Urdu sun yi kama a kalmomi amma daban a rubutu; a tattaunawar yau da kullun, masu magana da harsunan biyu na iya fahimtar junan su.

src: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."
mt: "Hangeul shine kawai abin da aka kirkira don yin abin alaka a cikin al'adun yau da kullum. Al'adun da aka kirkira a shekarar 1444 a zamanin Sarki Sejong (1418 - 1450). Sarki Sejong shine sarkin na hudu na Joseon Dynasty da shi ne daya daga cikin mafi yawan girmamawa. Sarki Sejong ya sanya sunan Hangeul Hunmin Jeongeum, wanda ke nuna "kamar yadda za a iya yin abin alaka a cikin al'adun yau da kullum".
ref: Hangeul shine kadai huruffi wadda aka kirkira kuma ake amfani da shi kullum. An kirkiro haruffin ne a 1444 a zamanin mulkin Sarki Sejong (1418 - 1450). Sarki Sajong shi ne sarki na huɗu a Daular Joseon kuma ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda aka fi ji da su. Asali ya sakawa haruffan Hangeul sunan Hunmin Jeongeum, wanda ke nufin “haruffa da su ka dace wajen koyar da mutane.

src: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). src: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
mt: Yayin da akwai akida da yawa game da yadda Sanskrit ya fito. Daya daga cikin su ne game da yadda tafiye-tafiye na Aryan daga gabas zuwa Indiya wanda suka yi amfani da harshensu. Sanskrit yana da al'ada da harshen Latin da aka yi amfani da shi a Yurope. Wani littafin da aka samu a duniya a farkon ya kasance a cikin Sanskrit. Bayan yin gudanar da Upanishads, Sanskrit ya fada zuwa gaba saboda yadda ake tsara. Sanskrit shine harshen mai yawa da kyau, wanda ya yi aiki a matsayin sanarwar manyan harshen Indiya, kamar yadda Latin shine sanarwar harshen Yurope masu yawa kamar French da Spanish.
ref: Akwai hasashe da yawa kan yadda aka sami harshen Sanskrit. Ɗaya daga cikinsu shine game da hijirar jinsin Aryaniyawa daga yamma zuwa India waɗanda suka zo da yarensu. Sanskrit tsohon harshe ne wanda za a iya kwatantawa da harshen Latin da ake magana da shi a Turai. Littafin farko da aka sani a duniya an rubuta shi da Sanskrit. Bayan an haɗa Upanishads, sai Sanskrit ya ɓace saboda matsayi. Sanskrit yare ne mai fadi da kuma mai wadatar gaske, wanda ya zama tushen harsunan Indiya da yawa na zamani, kamar dai Latin shine tushen harsunan Turai kamar Faransanci da yaran spanish.

src: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.

src: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"

ref: Mutane da yawa suna tunanin ranar da ɗan adam zai iya tafiya zuwa wata tauraruwa domin bincika wasu duniyoyi, wasu mutane suna mamakin abin da ke can wasu sun gaskata cewa akwai bakon tsararin sama ko wasu rayuwa da ke akwai a wata duniya. src: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

Iskar gas in yana zama siriri yayin da kake kara nisa daga tsakiyar rana. Bangaren da muke gani idan muka kalli Rana ana kiran sa photosphere, wanda yake nufin “kwallon haske”.

src: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

ref: Rana ba ta da abi haskakawa kamar Duniyar wanda za ka tsaye a kai. Duka ranar ya keru ne dan nauyin gas, wuta, da kuma sinadarin plasma. Iskar gas in yana zama siriri yayin da kake kara nisa daga tsakiyar rana. Bangaren da muke gani idan muka kalli Rana ana kiran sa photosphere, wanda yake nufin “kwallon haske”.

src: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
mt: Yayin da suka kai kusan shekaru 3000, a shekarar 1610, masanin kimiyyar Italiya Galileo Galilei ya amfani da teleskop don gano cewa Venus ta da alamun da aka sani, kamar yadda wani kwanan nan ya yi. Alamun ne wanda kawai ƙasa na Venus (ko na wani kwanan nan) wanda ya yi kama da kwanan nan ya yi. Alamun ne wanda kawai ƙasa na Venus (ko na wani kwanan nan) wanda ya yi kama da kwanan nan ya yi. ref: Kimanin shekaru dubu uku bayan haka, a cikin 1610, masanin Falaki ɗan ƙasar Italiya Galileo Galilei ya yi amfani da na’urar hangen nesa don lura cewa Venus tana da matakai, kamar yadda wata yake yi. Hanyoyi suna faruwa saboda kawai gefen Venus (ko na Wata) da ke fuskantar Rana yana haske. Matakan Venus sun goyi bayan ka'idar Copernicus cewa duniyoyin suna zagaya Rana. Sai kuma a sheakaru kalilian bayan haka a shekarar 1639, wani masanin ililmin taurari dan kasar Ingila mai suna Jeremiah Horrocks ya gano motsin tauraron Venus.

src: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
mt: Amazon River ita ce babbar kogin da kuma kogin mafi girma a duniya. Ya rasa kusan 8 da sauran koguna. Amazon kuma shi ne kogin mafi girma a duniya, a lokacin da yake 6 mils. A kogin Amazon, kusan 20% na ruwan da ke fitar da koguna daga cikin koguna zuwa cikin duniya ya fito daga Amazon. Kogin Amazon mai girman 6,387 km (3,980 mil) ya samar da ruwa daga dukkanin koguna masu yawa.
ref: Ƙoramar Amazon ita ce ƙorama ta biyu mafi tsawo kuma mafi girma a Duniya. Tana ɗaukar ruwa fiye da sau 8 a matsayin babbar ƙorama ta biyu. Amazon kuma shine kogi mafi fadi a Duniya, a wasu lokutan nisan mil shida. Cikakken kashi 20 cikin dari na ruwan da ke zubowa daga koramun duniyar zuwa cikin teku yana zuwa ne daga Amazon. Babbar Ƙoramar Amazon ta na da nisan 6,387 km (3,980 mil). Tana karbar ruwa daga dubban kananan ƙoramu.

src: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
mt: Kashi daya shida cikin mutanen Venezuela suna yin aiki, kuma kusan kashi biyu na waɗanda ke aiki suna aiki a cikin kasuwancin ƙasa. ref: Kashi goma sha takwas na ƴan Venezuela ba su da aiki, kuma mafi yawan waɗanda ke da aiki suna aiki ne a kananan masana’antu. Kashi biyu bisa uku na mutanen Venezuela na aiki ne a sashen ma’aikatu, daya bisa hudu kuma na aiki a masana’antu,sai kashi daya cikin biyar da ke noma. Wata muhimmiyar masana'antu ga 'yan Venezuela ita ce mai, inda ƙasar ta kasance mai fitar da kayayyaki zuwa ƙasashe, kodayake kashi ɗaya cikin ɗari ne ke aiki a masana'antar mai.

src: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
mt: Ko da yake mutane suna samun lafiya ne saboda cikakken gudun duniyar da aka samu a lokacin da aka zama (sama) tare da juyawar hidrojin atom zuwa takardar daidai daidai. Masana suna aiki don kirkirar iskar da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai. Amma, wannan, kuma, shi ne matsala mai yawa da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hanyar daidai da za a iya samun ta hany
ref: Taurari suna fitar da wuta da zafi saboda karfin da aka samo yayin da aka hada sinadarin Hydrogen da kwayoyin zarra (ko aka hada) tare domin haifar abubuwa masu nauyi. Masana kimiyya suna aiki don ƙirƙirar wata na’ura da za ta sarrafa makamashi ta irin wannan hanya. Wannan, duk da haka, matsala ce mai matuƙar wahalar warwarewa kuma zai ɗauki shekaru da yawa kafin mu ga an gina na’urori haɗaka masu amfani.

src: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
mt: Element da masana'antu za su iya yin tarayya daga daya zuwa daya da bai canza. Nitrogen a matsayin gaba kamar yadda yake yana da tasirin halittar da kuma liquid nitrogen. ref: Daidaikun sinadarai ko dunkulensu na iya canza yanayi ba tare da sun canza ba a karan kansu. Nitrogen a matsayin gas har yanzu yana da sinadarai iri ɗaya kamar nitrogen na ruwa. Yanayin ruwa ya fi yawa amma kwayoyin sun kasance iri ɗaya. Ruwa ma wani misali ne. Mahadin ruwa ya kunshi ƙwayoyin halitta biyu na sinadarin hydrogen da ƙwayar halittar oxygen daya. Yana da siffa iri guda ko da kuwa iska ce ko ruwa-ruwa ko kuma ma abu mai kauri. Kodayake yanayin jikinta na iya canzawa, yanayin sinadaran ba ya canja wa.

Yana da siffa iri guda ko da kuwa iska ce ko ruwa-ruwa ko kuma ma abu mai kauri. Kodayake yanayin jikinta na iya canzawa, yanayin sinadaran ba ya canja wa.

src: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

Majalisa ba ta da wani iko na kakaba haraji, sannan kuma, kasancewar babu ɓangarorin zartaswa da na shari’a na ƙasar, ta dogara ne kan hukumomin jihohi, waɗanda mafi yawanci ba sa bayar da haɗin kai, wajen ganin an tilasta aiki da dokokin. src: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."
mt: "Idan ka ke dauke da fim ɗin Girma, ka zai iya sanin cewa wani taswirar gudanarwa na gudanarwa an rubuta a kan gaba na Deklarace na 'Yanci. Amma haka bai ta kasance. Ba tare da wani abu ba an rubuta a kan gaba na Deklarace na 'Yanci, yana cewa ""Deklarace na 'Yanci na asali da aka yi a ranar 4 ga watan Yuli 1776"". Taswirar an rubuta a kai na gaba na wata, a cikin gaba. Ba a san wanda ya rubuta shi ba, amma an san cewa a farkon rayuwarsa, wani gudanarwa mai girman (ya ƙunshi 29¾ inches da 24½ inches) an tura shi don ajiye shi. Don haka, zai iya cewa an rubuta shi a matsayin wani labari.
ref: Idan ka kalli majigi mai suna National Treasure, za ka yi tsamanin an rubuta taswirar taska a bayan takardan Ƙudurin ‘Yancin Kai. Sai dai kuma, wannan ba gaskiya ba ne. Duk da cewa akwai wani abu da aka rubuta a bayan daftarin, ba taswirar taskar arziki ba ce. An rubuta a bayan Bayanin Samun 'Yancin kai kalmomin “Asalin Sanarwar Samun' Yanci ne a ranar 4 ga Yuli 1776”. Rubutun ya bayyana a ƙasan takardar, juye. A yayin da babu takamaiman wanda ya rubuta shi, an sani cewa a farkon rayuwar shi, babban takardan (yana daukar ma'aunin inci 29¾ zuwa inci 24½) an nada shi don ajiya. Don haka, da alama an ƙara tsarin rubutun ne kawai a matsayin laƙabi.

src: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
mt: A farkon mulkin kai, gungun kashe gobara na Singapore Botanic Gardens ya taimaka wajen canza jirgin kai zuwa birnin kashe gobara. A shekarar 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, hybrid na kashe gobara, an zabi a matsayin kyar kashe gobara na kasar.
ref: A farko farkon samun yanci, kwarewar masana lambu na kasar Singapore sun taimaka wajen maida ta tsibiri mai cike da tsirrai a yanki mai zafin yanayi. A shekarar 1981, an zaɓi furen Vanda Miss Joaquim, wanda ake samarwa ta barbara a gona, a matsayin furen ƙasa.

src: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
mt: Anan, an ci gaba da gina masu gini a karkara har zuwa kusan karni na Old Kingdom, amma masu gini na Giza na Giza ba su kai ga gina masu gini ba a cikin gini da kuma yiwuwar gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da gudanar da
ref: Ko da yake ginin dala a cikin dutse ya ci gaba har zuwa ƙarshen tsohuwar Masarautar, dala ta Giza ba a taɓa wuce ta da girmansu da ƙwarewar fasaha na ginin su ba. Sabuwar Daula ta daulolin baya na Misra su na yaba yadda kakanninsu su ka giggina abubuwa na tarihi, wadanda ko a wancan lokacin sun haura shekaru dubu.

src: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
mt: Kowace shekara a watan Oktoba kusan miliyan 1.5 na kwayoyin hallita sun yi tafiya zuwa yammacin manyan ƙasa, suna kusa da kogin Mara, daga yankin arewacin tsaunuka don rainan. Kuma kuma zuwa arewacin yankin bayan rainan a watan Afrilu kuma suna kusa da kogin Mara bayan rainan. Yankin Serengeti yana da Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area da Maswa Game Reserve a Tanzania da Maasai Mara National Reserve a Kenya.
ref: Kowace shekara a watan Oktoba kusan dabbobi masu cin ciyawa miliyan 1.5 suke tafiya zuwa tuddan kudu, suna ƙetare Kogin Mara, daga tuddan arewa don ruwan sama. Daga nan koma arewa ta hanyar yamma, sake tsallake kogin Mara, bayan ruwan sama a wajen watan Afrilu. Yankin Serengeti yana dauke da wajen shakatawa na Serengeti, Yankin Kiyayewa na Ngorongoro da wajen Keɓe Namomin Daji na Maswa a Tanzania da ma wajen namun daji na kasa a Kenya.

src: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
mt: Bayan yakin Faransa ya kare, Jamus ya fara yin shawarar yin haramcin jirgin saman Birtaniya. Jamus ya kira haramcin “Operation Sealion”. Kusan kashi ɗaya na sojojin Birtaniya na kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin daidaitattun kayayyakin da
ref: Tare da yakin Faransa, Jamus ta fara shirin mamaye tsibirin Biritaniya. Lambar-sirri ta Jamus ta sanya wa harin suna “Operation Sealion”. Yawancin manyan makamai da kayan sojojin Burtaniya sun ɓace lokacin da aka kwashe su daga Dunkirk, don haka sojojin ba su da ƙarfi. Amma Rundunar Sojojin ruwa na Sarauta na da ƙarfi sosai fiye da rundunar sojojin ruwan Jamus (“Kriegsmarine”) kuma da ya salwantar da duk wani mamayewar jirgin ruwan da aka aika ƙetaren hanyar ruwan Ingila. Kodayake, jiragen ruwan Birtaniya kalilan ne su ke kusa da hanyoyin da ake tsammanin za’a kawo farmaki saboda shugabannin sojan na tsoron sojojin Jamus na iya nutsar da su.

src: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."
mt: "Mun fara da bayani game da shawarwarin Italiya. Italiya ta kasance "na'urar" ta Jamus da Japan. Ta da sojojin da sojojin daidai, amma ta hada da motoci hudu na musamman kafin kafa yakin. Mafi girman abin da Italiya ta yi shi ne kashe basa'ir da motoci na Birtaniya a Masar. Sakamakon haka, Italiya ta yi yaki da Birtaniya a Masar. ref: Bari mu fara da bayani game da shirye-shiryen Italiya. Italiya ta kasance “kanin” na Jamus da Japan. Tana da rundunar sojan ƙasa da na ruwa marasa ƙarfi, duk da cewa sun kera sabbin jiragen ruwa guda hudu kafin barkewar yakin. Babban burin Italiya shine kasashen Afirka. Domin mamayar waɗannan ƙasashen, suna buƙatar samun wajen tara sojoji ta yadda rundunoninsu zasu iya ratsa tekun Bahr Rum su mamaye Afirka. Don hakan, dole ne su kawar da sansanoni da jiragen ruwan Birtaniya a Masar. Bayan waɗancan ayyukan, ba a tsammanin jiragen ruwan yaƙi na Italiya su yi wani abu kuma. Yanzu ga Japan. Japan ƙasa ce tsibiri, kamar Biritaniya.

ref: Bari mu fara da bayani game da shirye-shiryen Italiya. Italiya ta kasance “kanin” na Jamus da Japan. Tana da rundunar sojan ƙasa da na ruwa marasa ƙarfi, duk da cewa sun kera sabbin jiragen ruwa guda hudu kafin barkewar yakin. Babban burin Italiya shine kasashen Afirka. Domin mamayar waɗannan ƙasashen, suna buƙatar samun wajen tara sojoji ta yadda rundunoninsu zasu iya ratsa tekun Bahr Rum su mamaye Afirka. Don hakan, dole ne su kawar da sansanoni da jiragen ruwan Birtaniya a Masar. Bayan waɗancan ayyukan, ba a tsammanin jiragen ruwan yaƙi na Italiya su yi wani abu kuma. Yanzu ga Japan. Japan ƙasa ce tsibiri, kamar Biritaniya.

src: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

ref: Saukar D-Day da yaƙe-yaƙe masu zuwa sun 'yantar da arewacin Faransa, amma har yanzu kudanci bai sami yanci ba. Faransawa '' Vichy '' suka mallake shi. Waɗannan mutanen Faransa ne waɗanda suka yi sulhu da Jamusawa a 1940 kuma suka yi aiki tare da masu mamaye maimakon yaƙar su. A ranar 15 ga watan Agusta 1940, Kawayen sun mamaye kudancin Faransa, mamayar da aka yi wa lakabi da sunan “Operation Dragoon”. A cikin makonni biyu kawai Amurkawa da Sojojin Faransa na 'yancin faransa suka 'yantar da kudancin Faransa kuma suka juya zuwa Jamus.

src: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
mt: Submarines ne masu tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsawon jirgin da ke tsaw
ref: An tsara Jiragen ƙarkashin ruwa jiragen ruwa domin yin tafiya a ƙarkashin ruwa, kuma su kasance a can na wani dogon lokaci. An yi amfani da jiragen yaƙi masu tafiya a ƙarƙashin ruwa a Yaƙin Duniya na I da Yaƙin Duniya na II. A can baya ba su da sauri kuma ba su iya harbi mai nisa. A farkon yakin galibi suna tafiya akan saman teku, amma yayin da kimiyyar radar ta kara haɓaka, kwarancewa ta samu soasai yadda jiragen karkashin teku basu da zabi dole sai sun yi nutso yadda ba za’a iya ganin su ba. Ana kiran jiragen ruwa masu nutso na kasar Jamus da sunan U-Boats. Jamusawa sun iya tukawa da sarrafa wadannan jirage nasu. Saboda nasarar da suke samu da jirage masu tafiya a ƙarƙashin ruwa, bayan yakin ba a yarda Jamusawa suna da su da yawa ba.

src: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
mt: Ga watan Satumba 17, 1939, tsayayyacen Poland ta kasance ta fuskata, kuma abin yau ya kasance cewa ta hau da kuma ta sake tsayawa daidai da tsakanin Romania. Amma abin yau ya kasance cewa abin da ya shafe kusan 800,000 sojojin Red Army na kasar Soviet ta hau da kuma ta kafa tsakanin Belarus da Ukraine bayan da ta hau da kuma ta hau daidai da yankin gabashin Poland a wuri na kasa da kasa, wanda ya fuskanci Riga Peace Treaty, Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, da wasu yarjejeniyoyi masu yawa, daban daban daidai daidai.
ref: Ya zuwa 17 ga Satumba, 1939, tsaron Poland ya riga ya karye, kuma fatan kawai da ake da shi shine na janyewa sannan a sake shiri a kan tozon gadar Romania. Koda yake wannan shiri ya tashi daga aiki dare ɗaya, yayin da sama da sojoji 800,000 na tarayyar Soviet su ka shiga Belarus da Ukraine inda su ka shata fagen daga bayan mamayar kasar Poland wanda ya karya yarjejeniyar sulhu da aka yi a Riga, sulhu zaman lafiya na kasashen Soviet da Poland da ma wasu yarjeniyoyin na kasashen duniya tsakanin kasarshe biyu ko fiye da haka.

src: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

ref: Abubuwa ba suyi kyau ba ga yan Italia a Arewacin Afirka kusan tun daga farko. A cikin mako guda da sanarwar yakin Italiya a ranar 10 ga Yuni, 1940, Turawan Birtaniyya na 11 sun kame Fort Capuzzo a Libya. A wani harin kwanton-bauna da ke gabashin Bardia, Turawan ingila sun kame Babban Injiniyan Soja na Italia, Janar Lastucci. A ranar 28 ga Yuni, aka kashe Marshal Italo Balbo, Gwamna-Janar na Libya kuma magaji ga Mussolini, ta hanyar kuskuren harbi yayin da yake sauka a Tobruk.

src: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
mt: Shiyya ta Buda ta Tibet ta keɓa ne akan koyarwar Buda, amma an karɓa ta ta hanyar mahayana ta cikin gida da ta yin amfani da dabi'una daga Yoga na Indiya. A tsakaɓa shiyya ta Buda ta Tibet ita ce mai tsawo. Yana ƙunshe da Kundalini Yoga, zama da shugabancin cikin gida da hanyar cikin gida ta cikin gida. Ta hanyar Kundalini Yoga, shugabancin Kundalini (shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shug
ref: Buddhist na Tibet ya dogara ne da koyarwar Buddha, amma hanyar mahayana da ta hanyar fasahar India da yawa sun ninka ta. A bisa ƙa’ida Budancin Tibet yana da sauƙi. Ya kunshi tsarin motsa jiki na Yoga, kadaicewa domin tunani da kuma bin tafarkin son kowa da komai. Da Kundalini Yoga an samar da kuzarin Kundalini (kuzarin wayarwa da kai) an farka ta hanyar motsawar jiki, motsawar nufanci, mantras da ganin wa. Ginshiƙen tunanun Tibetan shi ne Abin Bauta Yoga. Duk da yake kafafen gani na abubuwan bauta daban-daban hanyoyin makamashi an tsaftace su, akan buɗe chakras inda ake ƙirƙirar tunanin wayewa.

src: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
mt: Shiyya ta Buda ta Tibet ta keɓa ne akan koyarwar Buda, amma an karɓa ta ta hanyar mahayana ta cikin gida da ta yin amfani da dabi'una daga Yoga na Indiya. A tsakaɓa shiyya ta Buda ta Tibet ita ce mai tsawo. Yana ƙunshe da Kundalini Yoga, zama da shugabancin cikin gida da hanyar cikin gida ta cikin gida. Ta hanyar Kundalini Yoga, shugabancin Kundalini (shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shugabancin shug
ref: Buddhist na Tibet ya dogara ne da koyarwar Buddha, amma hanyar mahayana da ta hanyar fasahar India da yawa sun ninka ta. A bisa ƙa’ida Budancin Tibet yana da sauƙi. Ya kunshi tsarin motsa jiki na Yoga, kadaicewa domin tunani da kuma bin tafarkin son kowa da komai. Da Kundalini Yoga an samar da kuzarin Kundalini (kuzarin wayarwa da kai) an farka ta hanyar motsawar jiki, motsawar nufanci, mantras da ganin wa. Ginshiƙen tunanun Tibetan shi ne Abin Bauta Yoga. Duk da yake kafafen gani na abubuwan bauta daban-daban hanyoyin makamashi an tsaftace su, akan buɗe chakras inda ake ƙirƙirar tunanin wayewa.

src: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
mt: Shirin ya fara ne a karfe 8:30 na safe lokacin kasa (15.00 UTC). Mawakan shahararren a kasar daidai suka gabatar da bhajans, ko waƙa masu girmama, zuwa Shri Shyam's feet. Mawaki Sanju Sharma ya fara yakin, sannan Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan kuma. Mawaki, Raju Khandelwal ya taimaka masa. Sannan, Lakkha Singh ya yi shawarar yin waƙa. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan kuma. Mawaki, Raju Khandelwal ya taimaka masa.
ref: An fara shirin da karfe 8:30 na yamma (15.00 UTC). Shahararun mawaka a faɗin ƙasar sun gabatar da bhajans, ko wakokin ibada, zuw ga kafafun Shri Sham. Mawaki Sarju Sharma, shi ya fara a maraicen sannan sai Shankar Choudhary ya biyo baya da Chhappan Bhog Bhajan ya biyo su. Mawaki, Raju Khandelwal yana raka shi. Sannan, sai Lakkha Singh ya yi jagora a rera waƙar bhajans. Farantai 108 na Chhappan Bhog (a Indiyanci, kayan abinci daban-daban gud 56, kamar, Alewa, 'ya'yan itace, masu kwanso, abinci da sauran su waɗanda aka bayar ga abin bauta) ga Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh ya kuma gabatar da Chhappan Bhog Bhajan. Singer da Raju Khandelwal yana rakiyarsa.

src: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."
mt: "A matsayin yin kira, an fara buga wani shirin da aka fi sani da shirin Cirque du Soleil. An kuma buga Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, wani Janissary band, da masu waka Fatih Erkoç da Müslüm Gürses. Sannan, Dervishes na tashi. Diva ta Turkiya Sezen Aksu ta buga tare da tenor na Italiya Alessandro Safina da masanin wasan kwaikwayo na Girka Haris Alexiou. Don kammala, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia ya buga shirin ""Troy""."
ref: Bikin ya fara da nuni na musamman daga mashahuriyar kungiyar nan ta duniya Cirque du Soleil. Ya cigaba da kungiyar waka ta Istanbul wato Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra a Janissary, daga cikin dakarun masarauta, da mawakan kungiyar Fatih Erkoç da Müslüm Gürses. Daga nan Muridai Masu Juyi suka shiga fagen. Shahararriyar mawaƙiyar Turkiyya Sezen Aksu ta yi waƙa tare da mawaƙin tenor ɗan ƙasar Italiya Alessandro Safina da kuma mawakin Girka Haris Alexiou. Domin kammala shirin, kungiyar rawa daga Turkiya wato Fire of Anatolia sun yi wasan su na shirin “Troy”.

src: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""
mt: "An ba wani gaba ga wasu masu jirgin saman jiragen kasuwanci da ruwa yayin da suke tafiya a cikin 90(F)-degree heat. Kouns ya ce, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""
ref: An bai wa fasinjoji ruwa yayin da suke jira a cikin didgiri 90 na zafi. Kaftin ɗin hukumar kashe gobara Scott Kouns ya ce, “ranar na da zafi a Santa Clara inda ma’aunin zafi ya kai 90. Duk wani tsawon lokacin da aka makale a kan abin nadi ba zai zama da dadi ba, alal akalla, kuma ya dauki a kalla awa daya kafin mutum na farko ya sauka daga kan jirgin.”

src: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
mt: Kamar yadda ta kasance ta bayyana a cikin bayanan da ke cikin, bayanai na kasa da kasa sun nuna cewa tsunadai an haifar da shi. Akwai wasu tsunadai na iya bayyana a cikin Pago Pago da Niue. Bambance-bambance ba a san ba a cikin Tonga, amma wasu lokuta sun yi yawa, wanda ya sa ta hana Tongan hukumomin daga samun taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen taƙaitaccen
ref: Labari na baya bayan nan ya nuna cewa, nazarin motsin teku na nuna alamun wata tsunami ta taso. Hakika an tabbatar da alamun tsunami a kusa da Pago da Niue. Ba a sami wata mummunar barna ko jin ciwo a rahoton da ke fitowa daga Tonga ba, amma kuma wutar lantarki ta katse, abinda ya hana hukumomi samun sanarwar gargadin tsunami wanda hukumar PTWC ta bayar. An rufe duk makarantu goma sha hudu a Huawaii wadanda suke kusa da bakin teku a ranar Laraba duk da cewa an janye jan kunnen.

src: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, mai kula da jirgin A1GP na New Zealand, yanzu ya yi tarihi ta hanyar yin jirgin mafi girma a cikin 48 shekarun Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, halalce. ref: Jonny Reid, direba ne na kungiyar A1GP New Zealand, a yau dan shekara 48 din ya kafa tarihi na mafi gudu a kan gadar Aukland Harbor Bridge, wanda bai keta doka ba. Mista Reid ya yi kokarin tuka Black Beauty, motar A1GP ta New Zealand, a gudu na sama da 160km / h ninki bakwai a bisa gadan. 'Yan sanda a New Zealand sun sami matsalar yin amfani da bindigoginsu na radar masu sauri don gane irin gudun da Mr Reid ya ke yi, lokaci daya da yan sandan suka yi nasarar auna gudun Mr Reid shine lokacin da ya rage gudu zuwa 160km / h.

src: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
mt: Masu tsaron Abu Ghraib na Iraq sun kashe gida a lokacin da aka yi tashin hankali. Masarurun sun zama sananne bayan aka samun tsananin yadda masu tsaron Amurka suka yi a cikin gida.
ref: An kone kurkukun Abu Ghraib na Iraq lokacin hargitsi. Kurkukun ya yi ƙaurin suna bayan an gano cin zarafin fursunoni da ake yi a can bayan dakarun Amurka sun karɓi iko.

src: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."
mt: "Yayin da aka sanar da cewa yawan kawo ababen hawa ya ci gaba a ranar ƙarshe, a matsayin da ake aiki, masu aiki na tsaro ba su kasance a kan hanyoyin Bishkek ba. An bayyana Bishkek a matsayin yana tafiyar da cewa "anarchy" ta hanyar masu binciken gaba ɗaya, a matsayin da ƙungiyoyin mutane suna tafiya a kan hanyoyin da suka kawo ababen hawa. Mutane da yawa na Bishkek suna da hannu a cewa masu binciken daga gabas ne suka kawo ababen hawa."
ref: Rahotanni sun nuna an kwashe tsawon daren ana wasoson kayan jama’a, sakamakon rashin jami’an tsaro a titunan Bishkek. Wani mai lura ya bayyana Bishkek a matsayin wanda ke nutsewa cikin halin “fitina” yayin da gungun mutane suka yi ta yawo a titunan tare da fasa shagunan kayayyakin masarufi. Da dama cikin mazauna Bishkek sun zargi masu zanga-zangar da suka fito daga kudanci da halayyar rashin mutunta doka.

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
mt: Bayan haka, shugaban Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya fara ne lokacin da wani abin hawa ba ya yin jama'a daga cikin gidansa a cikin garajinsa. Ya gudanar da abin hawa na WiFi, ya ce. Siminoff ya bayyana cewa kasuwanci ya ci gaba bayan yajin da ya yi a cikin 2013 a wani lokaci na Shark Tank inda kungiyar shirin ya kasa yin aiki a kamfanin. A ƙarshen 2017, Siminoff ya fito a kan QVC, wata hanyar kasuwanci ta tashin hankali. Ring kuma ya kafa shari'ar da kamfanin tsaro na ADT.
ref: A baya, Shugaban kamfanin Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya fara lokacin da ba a jiyo sauti kararrawar jikin ƙofar sa daga shagonsa a cikin garejinsa. Ya ce, ya gina ƙararrawar ƙofa ta WiFi. Siminoff ya ce tallace-tallace sun bunkasa bayan bayyanarsa a 2013 a cikin wani taron fim na Shark Tank inda taron kwamitin ya nuna ba da tallafin farawa. A ƙarshen 2017, Siminoff ya bayyana a tashar telebijin mai sayarwa ta QVC. Ring ta kuma sasanta takardar kotu tsakanin wata kamfanin adawa na tsaro wato ADT Corporation.

src: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."
mt: "Shirin PBS na da kusan biyar da-Emmy kyaututtuka, da tsawon lokaci na gudana ba tare da Sesame Street da Mister Rogers' Neighborhood ba. Kowane shiri na shirin zai nuna shiri a cikin littafi kuma zai bincika wannan shiri ta hanyar wasu labarai. Kowane shiri na shirin zai ba da shawarar littattafan da yara za su iya gani lokacin da suka zo cibiyar kiyayyar littattafai. John Grant, daga WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) ya ce "Reading Rainbow ta koyar da yara yadda za a yi,... rahotonsa na kiyayyar littattafai - [shirin] ya ba da shawarar yara suka gano littafin da za su iya yin." An san da yawa, ciki har da John Grant, cewa yuwuwar kudaden daidaito da canjin tattalin arziki na shirin kiyayyar littattafai na yin amfani da shi.
ref: Shirin PBS ya ci lambobin yabo kimanin dozin biyu na Emmy, ya kuma kasance kawai a bayan shirin Sesame Street da Shirin Mister Rogers Neighborhood wajen dadewa ana yinsa. Kowane aukuwar shirin zai mayar da hankali kan wani jigon wani littafi na musamman sannan zata bincika jigon ta hanyan labarai masu yawa. Kowane shirin zai ba da shawarwarin littattafa wanda ya kamata yara su nema idan sun je ɗakin karatu. John Grant, daga WNED Buffalo (yayin Karanta tashar gida ta Rainbow) ya ce “Karanta Rainbow ya koya wa yara dalilin karatu, son karatu - [wasan kwaikwayo] ya karfafa wa yara gwiwa su dauki littafi su karanta.” Yawanci sun gaskanta, tare da John Grant, da cewa kudade da matsawa a fasaha na shirye-shiryen talabijin na taimakawa zuwa karshen jere.

src: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

An yanke cewa za’a sare ta ranar Talata, amma sai wani hukunci gaggawa na kotu ya ceci lamarin.

src: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""
mt: "Animal Liberation da Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) suna kira don ayyana kamfanin kashe dabbobi a cikin abattoirs na kasar Australia. Shugaban RSPCA New South Wales David O'Shannessy ya ce binciken da martani a cikin abattoirs na kasar Australia za a samu. ""CCTV za a iya yin alamar daidai ga masu aiki da dabbobi cewa kare su ya kasance na farko a cikin abattoirs na kasar Australia."""
ref: Kungiyoin kare hakkin dabbobi da kungiyar yanta dabbobi da kuma kungiyar hana yi wa dabbobi ukuba, na kiran cewa lallai ne a saka na’urar daukan hoto mai motsi, a dukkan mayankar da ke kasar Australiya. Sabon babban jami’in RSPCA na Wales ta Kudu David O'Shannessy ya shaidawa ABC cewa ya kamata a sa-ido da kuma duba mayanka ya kasance aikin yau da kullum a Australia. “Na’urar daukar hoton zai ja hankali ga wadanda ke aiki da dabbobi wajen tabbatar da cewa kiwon dabbobin shine mafi muhimmaci.”

src: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
mt: Labaran ya fito a cikin gida mai lamba a ranar Litinin a matsayin da ake gudanar da abokan hulɗar don Jeff Weise da uku daga cikin shida na 'yan kasa suna aiki a matsayin da ake gudanar da abokan hulɗar na ciyawa a ranar 21 ga watan Maris. src: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
mt: Manyan masu shirya yakin nuna shawarar sun ce kusan 100,000 mutane sun shiga biranen Jamus masu yawa kamar Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, da Hanover. A Berlin, hukumomin tsaro sun yi hasashen 6,500 masu shirya yakin nuna shawarar. Yakin nuna shawarar kuma ya shahara a Paris, Sofia a Bulgaria, Vilnius a Lithuania, Valetta a Malta, Tallinn a Estonia, da Edinburgh da Glasgow a Scotland. A London, kusan 200 mutane sun shiga cikin birnin da ofisoshin masu shirya yakin nuna shawarar. Yau, watan Yuni, an yi yakin nuna shawarar a Poland yayin da kasar ta sanya ta amince da ACTA, wanda ya haifar da gwamnatin Poland ta sanar da cewa ba ta amince da shawarar ba, a yau. Latvia da Slovakia suna daidaita amincewa da shawarar.
ref: Masu shirya zanga-zangar sun ce kusan mutane 100,000 ne suka fito a biranen Jamus kamar su Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, da Hanover. A Berlin, yan sanda sun kimanta masu zanga-zanga guda 6,500. An kaddamar da zanga-zanga a garin Paris, da garin Sofia na Bulgaria, da garin Vilinius a Lithuania, da Valetta a Malta, Tallinn a Estonia, da kuma garin Edinburgh da garin Glasgow a Scotland. Kimanin mutane 200 ne suka yi zanga-zanga a kofar inda manyan ofisoshin wasu masu haƙƙin mallaka su ke. Watan da ya gabata, akwai manya-manya zanga-zanga a Poland yayin da kasar ta sa hannu a ACTA, wanda ya haifar da gwamnatin Poland yanke shawarar kin amincewa da yarjejeniyar, a halin yanzu. Latvia da Slovakia duk sun jinkirtar da aiwatar haɗin kai da ACTA.

src: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

Ma’aikatar tattalin arziki, Ciniki da Masana’antu ta Japan (METI) ta ce tana sane da hatsarurruka guda 27 da ke da alaƙa da na’urorin. src: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
mt: Shugaban yanzu da mace ta farko na Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ta sanar da shawarar ta shiga zaben shugaban kasa a ranar ƙarshe a La Plata, birni 50 kilometers (31 miles) daga Buenos Aires. Mace Kirchner ta sanar da shawarar ta shiga zaben shugaban kasa a Argentine Theatre, wani lokaci da ta amfani da shi don fara kamal ɗa ta 2005 don majalisar Buenos Aires.
ref: Majalisar dattijai da matar shugaban kasar Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ta sanar da fitowar takarar shugaban kasa a yammacin jiya a La Plata, gari dake kilomita 50 (Mil 31) daga Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner ta bayyana ra’niyyarta ta tsayawa takarar shugabanci a Gidan wasannin Argentina, wurin da ta yi amfani da shi domin fara kanfen ɗinta na takarar Majalisar Dattawa a shekarar 2005 a matsayinta na wakiliyar Buenos Aires.

src: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
mt: ACMA kuma ya gano cewa wani bayani na watsa shirye-shiryen da aka gudanar a yanar gizon, Big Brother ba ya yin watsa labarai na kula da kwayoyi ba saboda an kula da shi a yanar gizon Big Brother. Doka ta kula da wasu shirye-shirye ta hana watsa labarai na kula da kwayoyi, amma don yin watsa labarai na kula da kwayoyi, wata kwayar kula da kwayoyi ta kasance a cikin gida.
ref: ACMA ta kuma gano cewa ko da yake ana duba bidiyon a yanar gizo, Big Brother bai sabawa dokoki ba domin ba a adana kafofin watsa labarai ba a shafin Big Brother na yanar gizo. Dokar yada labarai ta samar da hanyar kula ga al'amuran yanar gizo, duk da cewa baya zama al'amarin yanar gizo sai ya kasance yana kan sabar.

src: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. src: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

Mitchell Gourley na Ostiraliya ya gama na goma sha ɗaya a cikin tsayuwar Super-G na maza. Ɗan gasar Czech Oldrich Jelinek ya gama na goma sha shida a cikin Super-G na zaunen maza. Jong Seork Park na Koriya ta Kudu ya kammala na ashirin da huɗu a gasar maza ta Super-G.

src: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."
mt: "Kofofin bincike ya fara a Birmingham Crown Court da ya kare a watan Agusta 3. Mai gabatar da shi, wanda aka kama a wurin, ya yarda cewa ya kawo wani kai wanda ya yi amfani da shi don kawo kansa daga kwayoyin da aka tashi a shi ta yadda kusan mutane 30. Blake kuma an kama shi da lahani don yin amfani da kai don kawo kuduri. Mai yadda Blake ya ce cewa zai iya yin haka."
ref: An gudanar da shari’ar a Kotun Masarautar Birmingham kuma an kammala ta a ranar 3 ga watan Agusta. Mai gabatar da labarai/shirin, wanda aka kama a wajen, ya musanta harin inda ya yi ikirarin ya yi amfani da sundukin karfe wajen kare kansa daga kwalaben da wasu mutum kimanin talatin ke jefawa kansa. An samu Blake da laifin yunkurin karkata akalar shari’ah. Alƙalin ya shaidawa Blakes cewa “kusan ba makawa” za a tura shi gidan kurkuku.

src: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
