src: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

ref: Canjin da aka gabatar ya riga ya wuce duka gidaje a cikin 2011. Kasawar jimla ta biyun, wadda ta kawo shawarar haramta ƙungiyoyin jama’a na jinsi guda, zai iya bude kofa ga ƙungiyoyin jama’a nan gaba. src: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."
mt: "Panama Papers" shi ne kalmar gaba ɗaya don kusan takardun 10 miliyan daga kamfanin shari'a na Panama Mossack Fonseca, wanda aka tara ga labaran a ranar ƙasa a 2016. Takardun sun nuna cewa bankunan 14 sun taimaka wa masu kudin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin daidai ɗin
ref: “Panama Papers” wata laima ce wadda ta kunshi takardu sama da miliyan goma na wani kamfanin lauyoyi na Panama, Mossack Fonseca, da aka tseguntawa yan jarida a shekarar 2016. Rubutattun hujjoji sun nuna cewa bankuna sha hudu ne su ka taimakawa abokan hurdarsu masu karfin arziki boye dukiyoyi na biliyoyin dalolin Amurka don gujewa biyan haraji da sauran dokoki. Jaridar The Guardian ta Birtaniya ta ce Bankin Deutsche ne yake tafiyar da daya bisa uku na kaso 1200 na kamfanonin Shell da aka yi amfani da su wajen cimma wannan. An yi zanga-zanga a duk duniya, kara ta laifuka daban-daban, da shugabannin gwamnatocin Iceland da Pakistan duk sun sauka.

src: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
mt: Ƙididdigar jiragen saman suna yadu a Iran, wanda tana da tarihin da ya fi tsawon shekaru wanda ba a kula da shi ba, don ayyuka masu alaƙa da sojoji da al'umma. Sanarwar kasa da kasa suna cewa ba za a iya shirya jiragen saman ba. ref: Hadarin jirgin sama ya zama ruwan dare a Iran, sakamakon tsoffin jirage wadanda ba a kula da su na ayyukan farar hula da sojoji. Takunkumin ƙasa da ƙasa na nufin ba za a iya sayan sabon jirgin sama ba. A farkon makon nan ne, wani jirgi mai saukar ungulu na yan sanda ya yi hadari inda mutane uku suka rasa rayukansu yayinda wasu ukun su ka jikkata. Watan da ta gabata Iran ta fuskanci bala’i mafi tsanani a shekaru da wata jirgin sama da ke hanyar zuwa Armenia ta fadi, ta kashe duka mutane 168 da ke ciki. A dai wannan watan ne wani jirgin saman ya kauce daga kan titin da jirgi yake tafiya a kai kafin tsahinsa a Mashad inda ya bugi wata katanga, tare da kashe mutum sha bakwai.

src: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
mt: Gungun binciken Iraq sun bayyana labarinsu a ranar 12.00 GMT a yau. Ya bayyana cewa kowa ba za a tabbatar da cewa ayyukan kowane nau'i a Iraq a wannan lokaci za su hana yakin addini, karuwar yaki, ko tsawon tsawo zuwa tsaka-tsaki. Labarinsa ta rufe da gudunmawar don gudunmawar gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudunmawar da gudun
ref: Kungiyar bincike na Iraq sun gabatar da rohotonsu da karfe 12.00 GMT a yau. An yi kashedin cewa babu tabbacin cewa duk wani mataki da za’a dauka a kasar Iraki a yanzu zai iya maganin yakin banbance banbance darika, karuwar rikici ko ma dosar rashin doka da oda. Rahoton ya buɗe ne tare da roƙo don buɗe muhawara da kuma kafa yarjejeniya a Amurka game da manufofin Gabas ta Tsakiya. Rahoton ya yi matuƙar yin suka ga kusan dukkan ɓangarorin manufar Ɓangaren zartaswa na yanzu akan ƙasar Iraƙi inda ya nemi a gaggauta canja alƙibla. Na farko daga cikin shawarwarin da ta ba su guda 78 shi ne cewa ya kamata a dauki wani sabon shiri na diflomasiyya kafin karshen wannan shekarar don kiyaye iyakokin Iraki kan tsoma bakin da ake yi da kuma sake kulla alakar diflomasiyya da makwabtanta.

src: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

Yan sanda sun ce Lo Piccolo yana da damar hanun saboda shine na hanun damar Provenzano a Palermo kuma mafi girman kwarewanshi ya ba shi girman a tsakanin manyan tsohon zamani yadda suka fuskanci dokar Provenzo na ajiyar boye tare da karfafa yanar zumuncin su. src: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
mt: Hitoshi Saito, wanda ya lashe lambar zinare biyu a gasar Olympics, ya rasu a shekaru 54. An sanar da cewa kisan ya kasance a cikin bile ducts na ciki. Ya rasu a Osaka a Litinin. ref: Judoka Hitoshi Saito ɗan ƙasar Japan, wanda ya ci lambobin zinare biyu na Olamfik, ya rasu da shekaru 54. An ba da sanarwar sanadin mutuwar shine ciwon daji na ƙwayar cuta ta ciki. Ya rasu a Osaka a ranar Talata. Baya ga kasancewa tsohon zakaran gasar Olamfik da ta Duniya, a lokacin mutuwarsa Salto na rike da mukamin shugaban kwamitin horas da ‘yan wasa na Tarayyar Ƙungiyoyin Judo na kasar Japan.

src: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
mt: A lokacin da yake ziyartar, Iwasaki ya samu matsala a matsayin yadda ya kamata. Ya kashe shi ta hanyar masu kawo kudade, ya yi rashin lafiya a Tibet ta kusa da kudin, ya tsige aure a Nepal da ya kashe shi a Indiya.
ref: A lokacin tafiyarsa, Iwasaki ya shiga cikin matsala a lokuta da yawa. Yan fashin teku sun yi masa fashi, mahaukacin kare ya kai masa farmaki a Tibet, ya guje wa aure a Nepal kuma an kama shi a India.

src: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
mt: A lokacin da yake ziyartar, Iwasaki ya samu matsala a matsayin yadda ya kamata. Ya kashe shi ta hanyar masu kawo kudade, ya yi rashin lafiya a Tibet ta kusa da kudin, ya tsige aure a Nepal da ya kashe shi a Indiya.
ref: A lokacin tafiyarsa, Iwasaki ya shiga cikin matsala a lokuta da yawa. Yan fashin teku sun yi masa fashi, mahaukacin kare ya kai masa farmaki a Tibet, ya guje wa aure a Nepal kuma an kama shi a India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella ya rasa kawancen jirgin da ya kai karshen gasar har zuwa farkon gasar. Mataimakin shugaba Fernando Alonso ya kasance a matsayin babban jirgin kuma ya kai karshen gasar bayan wani gaba da kawancen jirgin. Michael Schumacher ya kai karshen gasar bayan Alonso, saboda matsalolin kawancen jirgin a cikin yajin aiki da yawa a cikin gasar.
ref: Motar Giancarlo Fisichella ta kwace masa inda hakan ya jawo fitarsa daga tseren jim kaɗan bayan farawa. Abokin wasansa Fernando Alonso shi ne kan gaba a mafi wasane, amma ya tsaya bayan dakatawar zango, watakila saboda lanƙwashewar wilin tayar gaba na ɓangaren dama ne. Michael Schumacher ya gama tserensa ba da daɗewa ba bayan Alonso, saboda lalacewar dakatarwa a yaƙe-yaƙe da yawa yayin tseren.

src: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
mt: A cikin 3 na mako, sama da 80 masu yin watsa shari'a sun fitar da su daga cibiyar ajiya ta tsakiya ba tare da amincewa da shari'ar ba. src: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
mt: A cikin 3 na mako, sama da 80 masu yin watsa shari'a sun fitar da su daga cibiyar ajiya ta tsakiya ba tare da amincewa da shari'ar ba. src: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
mt: Lodin ya ce masu sarrafawa sun fara yin sabon zartarwa don hana Afirka ta yamma yin shawarar daidaitaccen zartarwa. Diplomat na nuna cewa sun samu yadda ake ambuwa a doka ta Afghanistan don yin sabon zartarwa a matsayin wani abu mai tsanani. Wannan ya tsaya a baya, wanda ya nuna cewa yin sabon zartarwa zai kasance a tsakanin doka.
ref: Lodin ya kuma cewa jami'ai sun yanke shawarar soke zagaye na biyu ne domin kare 'yan Afghanistan da kuma hatsarin rashin tsaro na wani zaben. Jami’an diflomasiyya sun ce sun gano matuƙar rikitarwa a cikin tsarin mulkin Afghanistan da zai tabbatar da cewa sake zaben bai zama dole ba. Wannan ya sabawa rahotannin baya, wadanda suka ce sauke zaben zai kasance ya sabawa kundin tsarin mulki.

src: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
mt: "Daga zamanin da Pakistan ta samun 'yancin kai daga mulkin Biritaniya a 1947, Shugaban Pakistan ya naɗa 'Political Agents' don kula da FATA, wanda za a iya yin daidaitattun mulki da shari'a a karkara. Hujjar da ake yin daidaitattun mulki suna cikin jerin 247 na tsarin mulki na Pakistan."
ref: Tun samun yancin kasar Pakistan daga mulkin Birtaniya a 1947, shugaban Pakistan na nada “Wakilan siyasa” don shugabantar FATA, masu zartar da hukunci tamkar shugaba game da wuraren. Wadannan jami’ai su ke da alhakin samar daayyukan gwamnati da na shari’a ƙarkashin Siɗira ta 247 na Tsarin Mulkin Pakistan.

src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
mt: Wasannin, wanda ya hada da Ryan Gosling da Emma Stone, ya sami shawarwari a cikin kowane irin shawarwa. Gosling da Stone sun sami shawarwari don mafi kyawun mawa da mawa da kuma mafi kyawun mawa. 
ref: Fin ɗin, da ke nuna Ryan Gosling da Emma Stone, ya sami shiga cikin duk manyan ɓangarorin gasar. Gosling da Stone sun sami shiga neman cikin kyautar Fitaccen Jarumi da Jaruma. Sauran zaɓin sun hada da Hoto Mafi Kyau, Darakta, Majigi, Tsara Tufafi, Gyaran fina-finai, Makin Asali, Tsara Shiri, Gyara Sauti, Haɗa Sauti da kuma Asalin Labari. Waƙoƙi biyu daga fim, Audition (Wawaye Waɗanda Suke Mafarki) da Birnin Taurari, sun karɓi zaɓi don mafi kyawun waƙar asali. Lionsgate studio ta sami nadin 26 - fiye da kowane sauran ɗakunan studio.

src: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
mt: NHK kuma ya bayyana cewa kasuwancin tafkin Kashiwazaki Kariwa na yanki na Niigata ya ci gaba da aiki. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ya bayyana cewa bai yawaita daga zargin da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan tafkuna da aka yi a kan taf
ref: NHK ta kuma ruwaito cewa masana’antar samar da makamashin nukiliya ta Kashiwazaki Kariwa a gundumar Niigata tana aiki yadda yakamata. Kamfanin Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ya ba da rahoton babu wata illa daga girgizar kasar kuma an rufe matatar mai lamba 1 da 2 a tashar makamashin nukiliyar ta Shika. An ba da rohoto cewa gidaje 9400 a yankin ba su da ruwa sannan kusan 100 ba su da lantarki. Wasu hanyoyi sun lalace, al'amuran jirgin kasa ya katse a wuraren da abin ya shafa, kuma Filin jirgin saman Noto da ke yankin Ishikawa ya kasance a rufe.

src: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
mt: Al'amarin, kamar yadda ya shahara, zai kira ta rikitar da iyakokin, wanda Palestinanci ke daidaita a kan iyakokin kafin yakin Mideast na shekarar 1967. Kayayyakin da aka bayyana sun hada da matsalolin birnin Yerusalema wanda yake da girmamawa ga dukkanin dukkanin da yadda yake da iyakokin Isra'ila da Jordan. Isra'ila ta gano matsalolin birnin Yerusalema wanda yake da girmamawa ga dukkanin dukkanin da yadda yake da iyakokin Isra'ila da Jordan. ref: Takardar, gwargwadon fallasar, za ta yi magana ne kan rikicin iyakoki, wanda Falasɗinawa ke son ya ɗora shi kan iyakokin kafin Yaƙin Gabas ta Tsakiya na 1967. Sauran batu da aka tattauna bisa ga fadi sun hada da Jerusalem a nan gaba wadda ke da tsarki ga al’umma biyun tare da batun Jordan Valley. Isra'ila ta bukaci sojoji su ci gaba da kasancewa a kwarin na tsawon shekaru goma matukar an rattaba hannu yayin da hukumar falasdinawa ta amince da barin irin wannan kasancewar na tsawon shekaru biyar kacal.

src: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
mt: Bayan yadda yawa daga cikin iyalai suna bukatar taimako na shari'a don yin tsaron tsakanin su da OHA, an yi taro a ranar 20 ga watan Maris a East Bay Community Law Center don yin shari'ar masu tsaran gine-gine. Lokacin da masu tsaran gine-gine suka fara bayyana abin da ya shafe su, yawa daga cikin iyalai masu tsara gine-gine sun sami gamsarwa cewa Carolyn Wilson na OHA ta tasa kudin tsaro, kuma ta tafi garin. Masu tsaran gine-gine a Lockwood Gardens suna ganin cewa zai iya yiwuwa cewa akwai 40 iyalai ko fiye da haka da za su yi tsaro, saboda suka gano cewa OHA ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa kuma ta kafa k
ref: Bayan ya bayyana cewa iyalai da dama na neman agajin doka wajen yakin korar, an gudanar da zama na musamman a ranar 20 ga watan Maris a nan Al’umar East Bay Law Center ga wadanda damfarar gidaje ta shafa. Lokacin da masu masun haya suka fara musayar abin da ya faru da su, mafi yawan dangin da abin ya shafa sun fahimci cewa Carolyn Wilson na OHA ya saci ajiyarsu ta tsaro, ya tsallake rijiya da baya. Masu haya a lambun Lockwood sunyi imanin cewa za'a iya samun wasu iyalai 40 ko fiye da haka da zasu iya fuskantar kora daga gidajensu, tunda sun fahimci cewa 'yan sanda OHA suna binciken wasu kadarorin gidajen jama'ar Oakland wadanda ka iya fadawa cikin zambar harkar gidaje.

src: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
mt: Bayan wasannin, Keselowski ya zama babban shugaban kuma ya karɓi 2,250 points. A matsayin na biyu, Johnson ya kasance a matsayin 2,243. A matsayin na uku, Hamlin ya kasance a matsayin 20 points da baya, amma biyu da baya na Bowyer. Kahne da Truex, Jr. suna matsayin na biyar da na shida kuma suna da 2,220 da 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, da Harvick suna matsayin na bakwai da na bakwai don shugabancin kuma suna da kashi 4 na wasannin da suka wuce a cikin shekarar.
ref: Bayan tseren, Keselowski ya kasance zakarar gwajin Gasar Direbobi da maki 2,250. Yana baya da maki bakwai, Johnson ne na biyu da 2,243. A matsayin na uku, Hamlin ya kasance a bayan na farko da maki ashirin, amma ya zarta Bowyer da maki biyar. Su kuma Kahne da Truex, Jr. su ne na biyar da na shida da maki 2,220 da kuma 2,207. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, da Harvick sun tsallake manyan matsayi goma na Gasar Zakaru ta Direbobi yayin da tsere hudu ne suka rage a kakar wasannin.

src: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
mt: An san cewa wannan shine babban lokaci a tarihin duniya inda mutane suka gano wani abu da aka tabbatar da cewa ya samo asali daga martian. Daga cikin kusan 24,000 meteorites da aka san sun fada zuwa kasa, kawai 34 ne aka tabbatar da cewa sun samo asali daga martian. Daga cikin manyan kwayoyin halitta 15, wanda aka kira martian, an kiyasta suka samo asali daga wani gajakar meteorite na yuli. Daga cikin kwayoyin halitta, wanda yake cikin gida, an sayar da daga US$11,000 zuwa $22,500 a kullum, wanda ya fi yawa da kudin zinare.
ref: An gaskata cewa wannan shine karo na biyar a tarihi da mutane suka ga abin da ya kasance abin da aka tabbatar a sinadarance abubuwan martian ne da ke fadowa zuwa duniya. Daga cikin kimanin tubalan sararin sama 24,000 da aka sani sun fado zuwa Duniya, kusan 34 ne kawai aka tabbatar da asali Martian ne. Guda sha biyar cikin duwatsun ana danganta su da ruwan duwatsun da suka fado duniya a watan Yuli da ya gabata. Wasu daga cikin duwasun, wadanda samun su na da wuya a doran kasa, a siyar dasu tsakanin ukiya $11,000 zuwa $22,500 wanda haka ya ninka farashin zinari sau goma.

src: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
mt: Schumacher wanda ya yi ritaya a 2006 bayan da ya lashe gasar Formula 1 a cikin shekaru bakwai, ya kasance yana da alhakin yin mayar da Felipe Massa. Masanin Brazil ya samu rauni mai yawa a cikin 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa zai kasance a wani lokaci kuma a wani lokaci zai kasance a wani lokaci.
ref: Schumacher wanda ya yi ritaya a 2006 bayan lashe gasar Formula 1 har sau bakwai, shine zai canji Felipe Massa wanda ya sami rauni. 'Dan kasar Brazil ya ji mummunan rauni a kansa bayan karon da suka yi a lokacin babbar gasar tsere ta Grand Prix wadda ta gudana shekarar 2009 a kasar Hungary. Massa ya kamata ya fito aƙalla sauran lokacin kakar 2009.

src: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
mt: Har yanzu, AOL zai iya ci gaba da yin amfani da kasuwar IM a cikin gida a cikinsa, saboda yadda yake yin amfani da Amurka. Tare da wannan aiki a matsayi, wannan rahoton zai kai ga kawar da yadda yake yin amfani da masu amfani da ayyukan Yahoo! da Microsoft.
ref: Har zuwa yanzu, AOL ta sami damar motsawa da haɓaka kasuwar IM a tsarin ta, saboda yawan amfani da shi a cikin Amurka. Da wannan tsari a kasa, wannan ‘yanci na iya karewa. Yawan masu amfani da ayyukan Yahoo! da Microsoft a haɗe zai yi kunnen-doki da yawan abokan cinikin AOL.

src: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
mt: Shugaban Massachusetts na baya Mitt Romney ya lashe zaben shugaban kasa na jam'iyyar Republican ta Florida a ranar Litinin da kusan 46% na yawan kuri'ar ta. Shugaban Majalisar Dinkin Amurka Newt Gingrich ya zo na biyu da kusan 32%. A matsayin wani ƙasar da ta samar da kowane 50 na ƙuri'ar ta, Florida ta ba Romney duk 50 na ƙuri'ar ta, inda ya taya shi a matsayin mai kafa don zaben shugaban kasa na jam'iyyar Republican.
ref: Tsohon gwamnan Massachusetts Mitt Romney ya lashe zaɓen fitar da gwani na ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa na Jam’iyyar Republican a ranar Talata da kashi 46 na kuri’un. Tsohon Kakakin Majalisar Wakilai ta Amurka Newt Gingrich ya zo na biyu da kashi 32. A matsayin jihar da mai nasara ke kwashe komai, Florida ta miƙa dukkan wakilanta hamsin ga Romney, inda hakan ya tura shi sama a matsayin wanda yake kan gaba a zaben fidda gwani na Jam’iyyar Republican.

Shugaban Majalisar Dinkin Amurka Newt Gingrich ya zo na biyu da kusan 32%. A matsayin wani ƙasar da ta samar da kowane 50 na ƙuri'ar ta, Florida ta ba Romney duk 50 na ƙuri'ar ta, inda ya taya shi a matsayin mai kafa don zaben shugaban kasa na jam'iyyar Republican.
ref: Tsohon gwamnan Massachusetts Mitt Romney ya lashe zaɓen fitar da gwani na ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa na Jam’iyyar Republican a ranar Talata da kashi 46 na kuri’un. Tsohon Kakakin Majalisar Wakilai ta Amurka Newt Gingrich ya zo na biyu da kashi 32. A matsayin jihar da mai nasara ke kwashe komai, Florida ta miƙa dukkan wakilanta hamsin ga Romney, inda hakan ya tura shi sama a matsayin wanda yake kan gaba a zaben fidda gwani na Jam’iyyar Republican.

src: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
mt: "An gane Newt Gingrich, Gwamnan Texas Rick Perry, da 'yar majalisar Michele Bachmann a matsayi na hudu, na biyu, da na shida, kuma bayan an gudanar da sakamakon, Gingrich ya goge Santorum, amma ya yi magana da harshen Romney, wanda ya yi amfani da kamfen kamfen na gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da
ref: Tsohon kakakin majalisar Newt Gingrich, gwamnan Texas Rick Perry, da uwargidan majalisar wakilai, Michele Bachmann sun gama a mataki na hudu, na biyar, da na shida, bi da bi. Bayan sakamakon ya shigo, Gingrich ya yaba wa Santorum, amma yana da kalmomi masu wuya ga Romney, wanda a madadinsa aka gabatar da tallan kamfe mara kyau a Iowa da Gingrich. Perry ya fadi cewa zai “dawo Texas domin tantance sakamakon caucus na daren nan, in tantance ko akwai ko akwai alaman ci gaba man a wannan tsere”, amma daga baya ya ce zai ci gaba da tseren sannan ya yi gasan fid da gwani ran 21 ga Janairu a South Carolina. src: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."
mt: "Shafin gidan yanar gizon tsohon shirin ya bayyana shi a matsayin ""radio theater na farko da kuma spin na gaba da gaba na gaba da gaba na gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da gaba da g
ref: Wurin gizo na tashar yana bayyana wasan kwaikwayon a matsayin “tsohon gidan wasan kwaikwayo na rediyo tare da sabon wasa mai ban tsoro!” A farkon zamanin, an nuna wasan ne kawai a gidan rediyo na yanar gizo mai dogon lokaci TogiNet Radio, shafin da ke mayar da hankali kan maganan rediyo. A karshen 2015, TogiNet ya kafa Rediyon AstroNet a matsayin ƙaramar tasha. Asalin dandalin ya nuna sabbin yan wasa na murya, yan asalin East Texas.

src: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
mt: Ƙarfin Mumbai ya zo ta hanyar motar jirgin kasa a ranar 26 ga Nuwamba, 2008, inda suka yi amfani da gurɓatansu, kayayyakin yaki na tsawon lokaci da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu yawa, da yin amfani da sauran abubuwa masu y
ref: Maharan birnin Mumbai din sun shigo ne ta wani karamin jirgin ruwa ranar 26 ga watan Nuwamban 2008, an kawo musu gurnet-gurnet da makamai masu sarrafa kansu inda suka hari tashar jiragen kasa mai matukar dandazon jama’a ta Chhatrapati Shivaji da kuma shahararren ginin Otel din nan na Taj Mahal. Leƙen asiri da tattara bayannan David Headley sun taimaka don ba da dama ga ‘yan bindiga 10 su yi aiki daga kungiyar sojojin Pakistan Laskhar-e-Taiba. Harin ya kawo tsamin dangantaka tsakanin India da Pakistan.

src: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""
mt: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""
ref: Sakamakon nasarar kai da kai na Nadal kan dan kanada 7–2. Kwanan nan ya sha kayi a hannun Raonic a Brisbane Open. Nadal ya sami makuna 88% a wasan wanda ya ci makuna 76 a karo na farko. John Grant, daga WNED Buffalo (tashar gida ta Reading Rainbow) ya ce “Reading Rainbow ya koya wa yara dalilin karatu, ...son karatu - [wasan kwaikwayo] ya karfafa wa yara gwiwa su dauki littafi su karanta.”

src: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
ref: A makon da ya gabata, Naked News ya ba da sanarwar cewa za ta kara karfin ikon harshenta a duniya zuwa rahoton labarai, tare da sabbin labarai uku. Dama tana rahoto a Ingilishi da harshen Japan, ƙungiyar ta duniya za ta ƙaddamar da shirye-shiryen harsunan Spanish, Italiyanci, da na Koriya, don talabijin, yanar-gizo, da kuma na'urorin tafi-da-gidanka.

src: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
mt: Bayan yakin da aka gudanar a ranar Litinin, Carpanedo ta buga wasannin ɗayan ɗayan a gasa. Wasannin na farko shine Slalom, inda ta samu matsayin "Ba a gudanar da shi ba" a cikin kowane rani. 36 daga cikin 116 masu yin wasa sun sami matsayin wannan gasa a wannan wasa. Wasannin na biyu, Slalom mai girma, ya sa ta zama a matsayin a shida a cikin rukunin mata masu shiga cikin gida tare da lokacin buga kowane rani na 4:41.30, 2:11.60 daidai da lokacin buga farko wanda ta samu a matsayin tauna ta Claudia Loesch ta Austriya da 1:09.02 daidai da lokacin buga na na biyu wanda ta samu a matsayin tauna ta Gyöngyi Dani na Hungary. Sau 4 masu shiga cikin gida a cikin rukunin mata masu shiga cikin gida sun kasa gudanar da wasannin su, kuma 45 daga cikin 117 masu shiga cikin gida a cikin Slalom mai girma sun kasa zama a cikin gasa.
ref: Bayan abubuwan da suka faru a ranar Laraba, Carpanedo ya yi gasa a tsere guda biyu a wasannin neman zakara. Na farko ita ce Slalom, inda ta samu nasarar Ba ta inarshe ba a wasanninta na farko. 36 daga cikin gasa 116 sun sami irin wannan sakamakon a wannan tseren. Sauran tseren nata, Giant Slalom, ta ga ta gama a matsayi na goma a rukunin mata tare da saurin gudu na 4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 a hankali fiye da na farkon da ta kammala mai Austrian Claudia Loesch da minti 1: 09.02 a hankali fiye da na tara. Gyöngyi Dani na Hungary. Hudu daga cikin masu tsere a kungiyar mata sun gaza kamala gudu, kuma 45 a cikin 117 masu tsere a Giant Slalom sun kasa samun nasara a tseren.

Gyöngyi Dani na Hungary. Hudu daga cikin masu tsere a kungiyar mata sun gaza kamala gudu, kuma 45 a cikin 117 masu tsere a Giant Slalom sun kasa samun nasara a tseren.

src: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
mt: Yanzu, shi ne wani dan wasa na yau, Alex Ovechkin na Washington Capitals. Ya yi 2 gaɗa da 2 kawo kai a nasarar Washington 5-3 a kan Atlanta Thrashers. Gudunmawar Ovechkin ta farko na yau, wacce ta kawo kai ga kawar da kwallon Nicklas Backstrom; kawar da kwallon ta biyu na yau, wacce ta kawo kai ga kawar da kwallon ta 60, wanda ya zama dan wasa na farko da ya kawo kai ga kawar da kwallon 60 ko fiye a cikin shekarar, tun 1995-96, Jaromir Jagr da Mario Lemieux sun yi wannan.
ref: Yau dan wasan da ya fi nuna ƙwazo shi ne Alex Ovechkin na Washinton Capitals. Ya ci ƙwallaye 2 da kuma 2 da ya taimaka aka ci a nasarar wasan Washington 5-3 akan Atlanta Thrashers. Taimakon Ovechkin na farko a daren ta kasance sanadiyar lashe wasa ta rookie Nicklas Backstrom; kwallo na biyu da ya shigar da shi a daren shi ne na 60 a kakar wasanni, haka nan ya zama ɗan wasa na farko da zai shigar da kwallaye 60 ko fiye da haka a cikin wata kakar wasanni tun daga 1995-96, a lokacin da Jaromir Jagr da Mario Lemieux kowane a cikinsu ya kai wancan matakin.

src: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
mt: Bankin Northern Rock ya kasance na jama'a a 2008 bayan yadda kamfanin ya sami taimako daga gwamnatin Burtaniya. Bankin Northern Rock ya gama da taimako saboda yadda kamfanin ya shafe a matsayin yadda ya dace a 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group ya ci gaba da yin kuduri don bankin kafin bankin ya kasance na jama'a. A 2010, yayin da bankin yanzu na kasar Northern Rock ya kai ga bankin kasar Northern Rock plc ya kai ga bankin 'bad bank', Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin ba ta samu bankin 'good bank' ba, ba kamfanin kula da kayan aiki ba.
ref: An mayar da Bankin Northern Rock ta kasa a shekara 2008 bayan bayyana cewa kamfanin ya samu tallafin gaggawa daga Gwamnatin Burtaniya. Northern Rock ya buƙaci tallafi saboda matsalar da ya shiga a lokacin ƙaramin rikicin bashin gina gida marar madafa a 2007. Ɓirgin Grouƙ na Sir Richard Branson ya yi tayin sayen bankin da aka ƙi amincewa kafin bankin ya zama na kasa. A 2010, yayinda na kasa, banki na yanzu Northern Rock plc an rusa shi daga ‘banki mummuna’, Northern Rock (gudanar da kadara). Virgin ya sayi ' banki mai kyau' na Arewacin Rock ne kawai, ba kamfanin sarrafa kadara ba.

src: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
mt: Shirye-shiryen daidaitattun abinci na tsaro suna cikin bincike na kula da lafiyar kwayoyin hallita, masu tsaro a cikin bincike suna cikin gudanar da rikitarwa. A cikin haɗin gwiwar NPWS da kuma ƙungiyar masu tsaro na ƙasar Australia (NSW) Inc, masu tsaro masu zurfi suna cikin gudanar da ayyukan tsaro, kamar yadda ake cewa, masu tsaro hudu masu zaɓaɓɓen masu tsaro na farko sun sami ilimi da horarwa masu yawa.
ref: Maharba masu aikin gwajin maganin kwari, zasu kasance karkashin kulawar malaman gandun daji, yayin gwajin domin tantance ingancinsa. A cikin haɗin gwiwar NPWS da Sportungiyar Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, an ɗauki ƙwararrun masu sa kai, a ƙarƙashin shirin wasannin kungiyar maharba. A cewar Mick O'Flynn, na'ibin Daraktan na Park Conservation da Heritage tare da NPWS, maharban guda hudu da aka zaba don aikin harbi na farko sun sami cikakken tsaro da horo.

src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

ref: A lokacin gabatar da babban bayani na ranar Alhamis a Nunin Wasan Tokyo, shugaban Nintendo Satoru Iwata ya kaddamar da tsarin sarrafawa na sabuwar na’urar Nintendo Re volution. Kamar da abun kuna talabijin daga nesa wato remote, mai sarrafawa yana amfani da na’urorin sunsuna guda biyu da aka sanya kusa da talabijin ɗin mai amfani don daidaita matsayinta a cikin sarari mai fuska uku. Wannan zai bai wa masu wasannin bidiyo damar sarrafa wasan ta hanyar motsi da na’urar a cikin iska.

src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
mt: Shahararren labarai na Sin Xinhua sun bayyana cewa jirgin ne ya kai harin. Labaran baya sun bayyana cewa jirgin ya kai harin da ya sa jirgin ya fada kai harin a Kandahar. Labaran farko sun bayyana cewa jirgin ya fada kai harin a Kandahar bayan an tsige shi daga shirin shiga a Ürümqi.
ref: Tun farko kamfanin dillacin labarai na China Xinhua ya ba da rahoton wani jirgin da aka sace. Rahotanni daga baya sun nuna cewa an yi wa jirgin barazanar harin bam, sannan aka karkatar da shi zuwa Afghanistan, inda ya sauka a Kandahar. Rahotannin farko sun ce an juya akalar jirgin zuwa Afghanistan bayan an hana shi saukar gaggawa a Ürümqi.

src: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""
mt: "A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatare mai yiwuwa na kwamiti na adabi na kyautar Nobel a cikin Jami'ar Sweden, ta bayyana a matsayin wani shiri a shirin talabijin na Sveriges Radio a Sweden cewa, kwamiti, ba da daɗew ba ya samun Bob Dylan a gabanin samun kyautar Nobel a fannin adabin shekarar 2016, ya fuskanci matsin lamba. Danius ta ce, "A yau ba muke ba. Ma'aikatar ta kira da kuma ta kafa cibiyoyi ga masanin ilimi mai kula da aiki da masanin ilimi da ke cikin gida da kuma ta sami tambaya masu yiwuwa. Don yanzu, wannan ita ce kuma ita ce."
ref: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatariyar dindindin ta Kwamitin Adabi na kungiyar nagartattu a Kwalejin Nazarin Sweden, ta sanar a bainar jama'a yayin wani shirin rediyo a Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamitin, ba zai iya kaiwa ga Bob Dylan kai tsaye ba game da lashe kyautar Nobel ta 2016 a Adabi, ta yi watsi da ita kokarinta na isa gare shi. Danius ya ce, “Yanzu haka ba mwa yin komi. Na kira na kuma aika emails zuwa abokan aikinsa na kusa na kuma anshi amsoshi masu kyau. A yanzu haka, wannan bai isa ba.”

src: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."
mt: "A shekarar 1956 Słania ya koma Sweden, inda shekarar 1959 ya fara aiki a ofishin Sweden na gidan yari da ya zama mai kera kayan aikin gidan yari. Ya samar da fiye da 1,000 kayan aiki ga Sweden da 28 kasashe masu yawa. Ayyukansa na kimiyya da kuma bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da kyau da bayyana cewa yana da ky
ref: A shekarar 1956 Slania ya koma Sweden, inda bayan shekaru uku ya fara aiki da gidan waya na Sweden sannan kuma ta zama shugaban masu zane. Ya samar da sama da stamp 1000 ga kasar Sweden ga kuma wasu kasashen guda 28. Aikin shi yana da shaidan inganci da bayanin filla-filla har yana daya daga kadan daga sanannu cikin philatelists. Wasu sun kore a karban ayukansa kadai. Hatiminsa na 1,000 ya kasance mafi kyawun “Maɗaukakan Ayyuka na Sarakunan Sweden” da David Klocker Ehrenstrahi ya yi a shekarar 2000, wanda aka sanya a cikin Littafin Bayanan Al’ajabi na Guinness. Ya kuma tsunduma a zanen kudi ga kasashe da dama, misalai na kwanan nan na aikinsa da ya hada da hotunan Firaminista a gaban sababbin takardun kuɗin ƙasar Canada na dala $5 da $100.

src: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
mt: 800 mil da Trans-Alaska Pipeline System an kama su bayan wani gudanar da wuta ta kai tsaye ta hanyar Fairbanks, Alaska. Yayin da ake gudanar da wani bincike na tsarin kula da wuta, wani tsabon daka ya kai tsaye yayin da ake buɗe wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan wadannan w
ref: Mil 800 na hanyar man Trans-Alaska aka rufe, bayan asarar dubban gangar danyen mai a kudancin Fairbanks, Alaska. Matsalan wutan lantarki bayan gwaje-gwajen tsari na yau da kullum ta sanya bawul na taimako ya bude sannan danyen mai ya yi ambaliya kusa da Fort Greely tashar fanfo na 9. Budawar mafitar na bada damar fitar karfin aikin da gudanar mai a faifan tankin da zai iya rike ganga 55,000 ( gallan miliyan 2.3). Tun daga ranar Laraba da maraice, tankin yana cigaba da yoyo watakila daga zafin cikin tankin. Ba a cika wani yanki a kasa ba wadda zai iya rike ganga 104,500 bai rigya ya cika dam ba.

src: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

Ruwa na zubewa kan levee a sashi mai fadin kafa 100.

src: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
mt: Hamilton ya tabbatar da cewa Jami'ar Howard Hospital ya ajiye marigayen wanda ya kasance a matsayi mai dadi. Marigayen ya tafi Nijeriya, inda yanzu ana samun cututtukan Ebola. Hospital ya bi tsarin tsaro don tsaro, ciki har da rarrabe marigayen daga wasu don hana cutar zama a cikin jama'a.
ref: Hamilton ya tabbatar da Asibitin Jami'ar Howard ya ba da haƙuri a cikin kwanciyar hankali. Marar lafiyar ya je Najeriya, inda aka samu wasu sun kamu da cutar ta Ebola. Asibitin ta bi ka’idoji na kula da kamuwa da cuta, tare da raba masu jiyya daga sauran jama’a domin hana yaduwan cutan.

src: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
mt: Comets zasu iya kasancewa mai samar da ruwa zuwa kasa tare da abinci mai kowa wanda zai iya samar da protein da kuma taimakawa rayuwa. ref: Mai yiwuwa taurari masu wutsiya sun kasance ta cikinsu ruwan sama ke zuwa duniya tare da takin dabbobi wanda ke iya samar da kayan gina jiki domin tallafar rayuwa. Masana kimiyya suna fatan fahimtar yadda taurari suke samuwa, musamman yadda Duniya ta samu, tunda taurari masu wutsiya suka yi karo da duniya lokaci mai tsawo da ya gabata.

src: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."
mt: "Furodansu ya tafi zuwa Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, inda ya rasu bayan haka. An san shi yana da shekaru 20. A wata sanarwa, Bieber ya ce " [w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Kafofin watsa labarai na shirin shirya shirye-shiryen zamani TMZ suna sanar da cewa furodansu ya tashi a kan hanyar Sepulveda Boulevard da ya kira ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu ta hanyar furodansu
ref: An ɗauki mai ɗaukar hoto zuwa Cibiyar Kiwon Lafiya ta UCLA ta Ronald Reagan, idan daga baya ya mutu. An ruwaito cewa yana cikin shekaran sa na 20 ne. A cikin wata sanarwa, Bieber ya ce “duk da ya ke ba na wurin kuma ba ni da hannu kai tsaye cikin wannan mummunan hadarin, tunani da addu'o’ina suna tare da dangin waɗanda abin ya rutsa da su.” Shagin yanar-gizo na labarun nishaɗi na TMZ ya fahimta cewa mai ɗaukar hoto ɗin ya tsayar da motsarsa a tsallaken titin Sepulveda Boulevard kuma ya yi ƙoƙarin ɗaukar hotuna na tsayawar 'yan sanda kafin ya tsallaka titin kuma ya ci gaba, wanda ya sa ɗan sanda na Sintirin Babbar Hanya ta California wanda yake ba da hannu ya umarce shi ya koma a ƙetare, sau biyu. Bisa ga fadin yan sanda, direban motan da ya buge mai hoton na iya fuskantan zargin aikata laifi.

src: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. src: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: Gudummawar da aka buga a ranar Litinin a jaridun Kimiyya ta bayyana cewa an kirkira nau'in tsuntsu na kasa a cikin jirgin saman jiragen kasuwanci na Ekuador na Galápagos. Masana daga Jami'ar Princeton a Amurka da Jami'ar Uppsala a Sweden sun bayyana cewa nau'in kirkira ya samu a cikin dukkanin jiragen kasuwanci na Darwin, Geospiza fortes, da jirgin saman jiragen kasuwanci na cakar, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: Wani bincike da aka wallafa ranar Alhamis a mujallar Science ya ba da rohoto kan samuwar wani sabon jintsin tsuntsaye a Tsibiran Galapagos na Ecuadoria. Masu bincike daga Jami'ar Princeton da ke Amurka da kuma Jami'ar Uppsala da ke Sweden sun ba da rahoton cewa sabon jinsin ya samo asali ne a tsararraki biyu kawai, duk da cewa an yi imani da cewa wannan aikin zai dauki lokaci mai tsawo, saboda yaduwar da ke tsakanin tsaunin Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, da kuma bakin kakakus. finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
mt: Yayin da ake gudanar da taron fasaha kuma yana ɗaya daga cikin yakin da hukumar birnin Bucharest ke yi don sake yin tasiri na birnin Romania a matsayin birni mai kwarewa da kuma birni mai tsayawa. Birnin zai zama birni na farko a yammacin Turai wanda zai iya daukar CowParade, babban taron fasaha a duniya, tsakanin Yuni zuwa Agusta a shekarar 2011.
ref: Lamarin zayyane-zayyane shi ma yana cikin gangamin Taron Birnin Bucharest wanda ya nemi sake kaddamar da hoton babban birnin Romania a matsayin birnin fikirar kirkire-kirkire kuma mai tasiri sosai. Birnin zai kasance na farko a rukunin kudu maso yamma na nahiyar turai da zata dauki nauyin CowParade, taron mafi girma a duniya na zane wanda zai gudana tsakanin watan Yuni da Agusta na bana.

src: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
mt: Jirgin ya kasance yana yin wani gudanarwa zuwa Irkutsk da ke aiki ta rundunar sojojin cikin gida. An kafa bincike don binciken. Il-76 ya kasance ɗan gajeren abin da ya shafe tsawon yakin daga 1970s, kuma ya samu abin da ya shafe tsawon yakin a Rasha a watan Oktoba 7. A ranar 7 ga watan Oktoba, motar jirgin ya tsaya a kan hanyar jirgin, bata bayan rauni.
ref: An tafi zuwa Irkutsk da jirgin saman kuma sojojin cikin ƙasar ne ke sarrafa shi. An ƙaddamar da aikin bincike domin a bincika. Il-76 ta kasance daya daga cikin muhimmin ginshiki na sojojin Rasha da Soviet tun shekarun 1970 kuma ta riga ta fuskanci mummunar hadari a Rasha a watan da ya gabata. Ranan bakwai (7) ga watan Oktoba wani injin ya rabu yayin tashi, babu raunuka. Russia ta dakatar da II-76s na dan lokaci bayan wannan hatsari.

src: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
mt: Bayan The Simpsons Simon ya aiki a kan wasu shirye-shirye a matsayin masu shirya shirye-shirye. A cikin shekarun 1980s ya aiki a kan shirye-shirye kamar Taxi, Cheers, da The Tracy Ullman Show. A shekarar 1989 ya kirkira The Simpsons tare da Brooks da Groening, kuma ya yi shi ne masu shirya shirye-shirye na farko na shirin. Ba da daɗew ba ya barin shirin a shekarar 1993 amma ya ci gaba da yin sunan shugaban shirya shirye-shirye, kuma ya ci gaba da yin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cikin kudade a cik
ref: Kafin Simpsons Simon ya yi aiki a kan shirye-shirye da yawa a wurare daban-daban. A lokacin 1980s yayi aiki a kan shirye-shirye kamar Taxi, Cheers, da The Tracy Ullman Show. A cikin 1989 ya taimaka ƙirƙirar Simpsons tare da Brooks da Groening, kuma shi ke da alhakin ɗaukar ƙungiyar masu rubutu na farko. Duk da barin wasan shirin a 1993 an cigaba da kiransa shugaban shiri, kuma ya cigaba da karbar miliyoyin daloli a kowace kaka na kamasho.

src: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
mt: Fluke ta bayyana cewa yadda kusan kowa ya yi yunƙurin yin amfani da kai don yaƙar da mata daga magance kan lafiyar mata ba ta yi nasara ba. Ta bayyana wannan sakamakon ne saboda yadda yadda kusan kowa ya yi yunƙurin yin amfani da kai don yaƙar da mata daga magance kan lafiyar mata ba ta yi nasara ba. Ta bayyana wannan sakamakon ne saboda yadda yadda kusan kowa ya yi yunƙurin yin amfani da kai don yaƙar da mata daga magance kan lafiyar mata ba ta yi nasara ba.
ref: Fluke ya rubuta cewa ƙoƙarin wasu na hana mata yin magana game da harkokin kiwon lafiyar mata bai yi nasara ba. Ta kai ga wannan matsayin ne saboda yawan tofa albarkatun bakin mutane tare da kwarin gwiwa wanda maza da mata ke rokar cewa amfani da magungunan hana haihuwa sun zama dole.

src: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
mt: Wannan bai ta kasance a matsayin wani abu ba, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wani abu da ya kasance a matsayin wani abu, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda ya tabbatar da cewa a cikin dodo kawai, wanda
ref: Wannan ya tabbatar cewa ba wai kawai wasu dabbobin dinasour suna da gashi ba, wata fadar ma da ta yadu, amma ta yi cikakken bayanin da rubabbun halittu ba za su iya ba, kamar su launi da kuma tsarin kashi uku. Masana ilimin kimiya sun ce fiffiken dabbar launi kasa ne a sama mai dauke da kodaden launi da launin toka-toka ta karkashin ta. Binciken ya kuma ba da haske game da juyin halittar fukafiki a tsuntsaye. Domin gashin fuka-fukin dinosaur bashi da isasshen tsari, wanda ake kira kara, amma suna da sauran sifofin gashin fuka-fukan — tsandar gashi da kananan — masu binciken sun kammala cewa wata kila karan wani cigaba ne na juyin halittan wadannan sauran sifofin. Tsarin gashin fuka-fukan ya nuna cewa ba ana amfani da su ba ne domin tashi sama, sai dai domin samar da tsarin daidaiton dumin jiki da kuma motsawa. Binciken ya nuna cewa duk da cewa jelar ta wani karamin kakan kadangare ce, abin na nuna cewa gashin balagagge ne ba na dan tsako ba. Masu binciken sun nuna cewa, duk da cewa sun gamsu jelar ta kakannin kadangare ce, ta kuma nuna cewa ta balagagge ce ba jariri ba.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

Manyan masu bincike sun ce wannan na iya sa a gano ciwon daji, tarin fuka, HIV da zazzaɓin cizon sauro da wuri ga marasa lafiya a ƙasashe masu ƙarancin kuɗaɗen shiga, inda adadin warkewa na cututtuka kamar sankarar nono zai iya kasancewa rabin na ƙasashe masu arziki.

src: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
